original: As I was lying in my bed at night I was suddenly woken by the hissing and growling of my favorite cat. The bedchamber was alive with scratching, scurrying noises, coming from the very walls themselves. I sprang from the bed, but the noises suddenly disappeared and a subsquent investigation of the chamber revealed nothing but patched stone walls.
translation: 我刚躺着床上时，我最爱的猫突然叫了起来，把我给闹醒了。我的卧室好像有生命似的，从墙壁里传来一阵又一阵搔抓，乱窜的声音。我从床上弹了起来，但声音马上就消失了，随后的调查却什么都没有发现，依然是只有一堵石墙在那。

original: Could there be rats in the walls?
translation: 可能是有老鼠在墙里面？

original: The servant I had sent to fetch water never returned and when I went to investigate I noticed a strange light emanating from the well. I peered inside and saw a color like no color I had ever seen before. It was like smoke, cold and wet but burning my skin where it touched.
translation: 我叫去打水的仆人再也没有回来，当我想去看一下发生了啥事的时候，我注意到了一束从井里传上来的奇怪的光。我往井里看去，发现了一种我从来没见过的色彩。它就像烟一样，而且又湿又冷，但却好似灼烧着我的皮肤。

original: That color is not from this earth!
translation: 那颜色并不存在于这个世界！

original: The well must have gone bad

I had repeatedly questioned my servant about the locked mausoleum beneath the castle but it wasn't until today that I found the key, hidden inside a rotting chest in the oldest castle tower. Inside the tomb's dusty passageways I found an empty stone coffin which bore the inscription '[Root.GetFirstName] [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]'.
translation: 我曾一次次的询问我的仆人，询问他那个在城堡下锁着的陵墓的事情，但一直到今天我才找到了那把藏在一座腐烂的城堡塔里面的钥匙。在那座陵墓里布满灰尘的通道中，我发现了一副空的石棺材，上面刻着「[Root.GetFirstName]·[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]」。

original: This coffin looks comfortable to sleep in
translation: 这棺材看上去睡里面会很舒服

original: Well, that was morbid... seal the tomb!
translation: 呃，这真让人不适……封上棺材！

original: An old cottar and his wife who were known for their cruelty to cats were found dead in their home this morning, their bones picked clean of meat. My steward tells me that the local townspeople had their cats go missing the day before, but all the missing cats returned today looking fat and happy...
translation: 一个众所周知对猫很残忍的老佃农和他的妻子今天早上被发现死在他们家里，尸体只剩下骨头，一点肉都没有。我的管家告诉我当地人发现他们的猫前些天都失踪了，但所有失踪的猫今天都回来了，而且它们看上去都胖了，而且很高兴……

original: Pass a law banning the killing of cats
translation: 通过一个禁止杀猫的法律

original: Since the incident some weeks ago I have felt uneasy. I took a walk along the coast to clear my mind and found a small village where the people claimed to worship the 'Old Ones', Gods older than even those of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith. They invited me to join in their rituals and showed me a dusty old grimoire written by a mad Saracen.
translation: 在这件事发生后的几个星期，我一直感到不安。我想要让头脑清醒一点，于是就到了海边散步，却意外发现了一个村庄，里面的人声称他们信奉一个名为「旧日支配者」的存在。神明甚至要比那些[Root.Religion.GetName]的信仰还要久远得多。他们邀请我去加入他们的仪式，同时向我展示了一本由一个疯狂的萨拉森人写的布满灰尘的古老魔法书。
我一定要学这本魔法书

original: Intense study of the grimoire has gained me much knowledge. I have devised a ritual to awaken the most powerful of the Old Ones where he sleeps, dead but dreaming, in his watery tomb beneath the ocean. The cult has prepared the ritual attire and is gathering the necessary sacrifices.
translation: 通过对这本魔法书没日没夜的学习，我了解到许多新知识。为了唤醒那个正在沉睡在海底坟墓的最强的古老存在，我筹划了一个仪式。教派已经准备好了仪式所需的服装和必要的祭品。

original: [Root.GetBestName] puts on a black robe and wizened old hat
translation: [Root.GetBestName]穿上了黑色长袍和干瘪的老帽子

original: The cult has gathered for the ritual on the shore of a black and stormy sea. The chanting begins, Ph'nglui mglw'nafh..., and in the depths of the dark waters something stirs...
translation: 教派为了举行这个仪式，已经聚集到了一片黑暗而且暴躁的海洋岸边。他们开始念咒，Ph'nglui mglw'nafh……，在一片黑暗的海底，有什么东西苏醒了……

original: What have I done?! I must stop this!
translation: 我都干了啥？！我必须阻止这一切！

original: I steered the longboat through the raging waters towards the monstrous creature. It stood as tall as a castle tower, with the body of a man and the head of a great tentacled beast. I knew that I had awoken it from where it slept beneath the waves and that it was here to end the age of man. There was only one thing I could do...
translation: 我开着一条大船穿过汹涌的水流，向那只怪物冲去。它站着时就像塔一样高，有着人类的身体和触手怪物一样的头。我知道我已经从它沉睡的海底里把它唤醒了，它会终结人类的时代。我只能这样做了……

original: I awoke in my own bed weak and sweating. The servants told me that they had found me on the shore, naked and half-drowned. I asked them about the creature and the ship but they just looked at me with worried eyes and shook their heads. It seems I am the only living witness to these events.
translation: 我在自己的床上惊醒过来，满身都是汗。仆人告诉我他们在海岸边发现了我，全身赤裸，奄奄一息。我向他们打听那只怪物跟船的事，但他们只是用担忧的眼神看着我，摇了摇头。看上去好像只有我一个活着的目击者。

original: I must put them to print
translation: 我一定要把这事情写下来

original: The formal title '§Y$TITLE$§!' has been abandoned.
There is no reason to formally use the title '§Y$TITLE$§!' anymore - it sounds primitive and shall henceforth be abandoned.
translation: 没有理由在正式场合去使用「§Y$TITLE$§!」这个头衔了，它听上去是多么的原始，是时候该放弃了。

original: The §Y$RELIGION$§! faith can be reformed into an organized religion
translation: §Y$RELIGION$§!信仰可以改造成一个有组织的宗教

original: The Holy Site of §Y$SITENAME$§! is completely under the control of §Y$RELIGION$§!
The Holy Site of §Y$SITENAME$§! is held by a member of §Y$RELIGION$§!, but is a vassal of another religion
translation: §Y$SITENAME$§!的圣地由§Y$RELIGION$§!的信徒掌控，但其领主信仰另一个宗教

original: The Holy Site of §Y$SITENAME$§! is not held by a member of §Y$RELIGION$§!
The Holy Site of §Y$SITENAME$§! is located in the county of §Y$COUNTY$§!
We cannot declare war on §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! while we are raiding them
translation: 当我们在劫掠他们的时候，不能对§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!宣战

original: Does NOT control at least §Y$VAL$§W holy sites\n
Crossing of the Major River §Y$RIVER$§! to §Y$TO$§!
When attacking over a Major River, the attacking army will get a significant combat penalty
translation: 当跨过一条主要河流进攻时，进攻方军队会有一个很大的作战减成

original:
From Realm: §G$REALM$§!
   Holdings: §Y$HOLDINGS$§!
   Cap per Holding: §Y$PERHOLDING$§!
translation:
来自领地：§G$REALM$§!
地产：§Y$HOLDINGS$§!
每块地产的上限：§Y$PERHOLDING$§!

original: All Rulers above the rank of Count accumulate Technology Points in each of the three groups based on their Attributes.\nThese points can then be spent to increase the technological level in their capital.\nTechnology can also spread to neighbouring provinces, between demesne provinces or in Trade Zones.
translation: 所有伯爵等级以上的统治者基于他们的属性在三个组别中分别积累科技点。\n这些科研点可以用来在首府升级科技。\n科技可以通过领地接壤或者是贸易传播到邻近省份。

original: This Holy Site is under your control
translation: 这个圣地在你的控制之下

original: Modifier to all Units and Holdings controlled by this religion:
translation: 这个宗教对其所控制的所有单位的影响：

original: Additional Modifier in counties of this religion:
translation: 这个宗教影响下的省份的额外修正：

original: This County contains §Y$HOLYSITE$§!, a Holy Site of §Y$RELIGION$§!
translation: 这个省份拥有§Y$HOLYSITE$§!，一个§Y$RELIGION$§!的圣地

original: We are currently under attack for religious reasons. If I accept conversion, I can end this war now and protect my people...
translation: 我们现在正因为宗教原因被攻击.如果我选择改变信仰，我们就可以结束这场战争，保护我们的人民……

original: §YHostile§! and raiding §Y$ENEMY$§! for loot.\nThis will last another §Y$DAYS$§! days.
translation: §Y敌对§!且正在劫掠§Y$ENEMY$§!。\n这还将持续§Y$DAYS$§!天。

original: §YHostile§! towards §Y$ENEMY$§! due to being raided.\nThis will last another §Y$DAYS$§! days.
translation: 由于受到劫掠，与§Y$ENEMY$§!§Y敌对§!。\n这还将持续§Y$DAYS$§!天。

original: §YHostile§! towards §Y$ENEMY$§! due to mutual raids.\nThis will last another §Y$DAYS$§! days.
translation: 由于相互劫掠，与§Y$ENEMY$§!§Y敌对§!。\n这还将持续§Y$DAYS$§!天。

original: Skilled shipwrights are hard at work here, building all sorts of seafaring vessels.
translation: 熟练的造船工人在这里努力工作，建造各种远航船舶。

original: The §Y$RELIGION$§! faith considers §Y$HOLDING$§! a holy site
They have control of the holding

translation: 用正确的文化去教导继承人
用外国的文化去教导继承人
§Y$FROM$§!与§Y$TO$§!港口之间的陆上运输路线

original: A Portage allows ships to move between Major Rivers over a land county
translation: 陆上运输点允许船只跨越一个陆地省份在两条主要河流间移动

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! must be able to marry and produce heirs
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!必须能够结婚且有能力生育

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! is not already targeted by a Prepared Invasion
§Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§! can only prepare one invasion in [Actor.GetPossPronoun] lifetime
translation: §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§!只能在[Actor.GetPossPronoun]一生中发动一次准备入侵

original: The ancient [Root.Religion.GetName] religion is proving unable to withstand the onslaught of the Cross and the Moon. Rather than abandoning the old ways, [Root.GetTitledName] and the most powerful priests have decided to reform the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith. With codified rites, a holy scripture and a strict church hierarchy under a single leader, they hope that the reformed [Root.Religion.GetName] faith is better armed to fight back against the weak and effeminate foreign beliefs!
translation: 古老的[Root.Religion.GetName]宗教已经被证明无法抵御十字架与月亮的冲击。比起完全放弃老路，[Root.GetTitledName]与最有势力的祭司们已经决定改革[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰。成体系的礼仪，一部神圣经典和在单一领导者下的严格教会等级制是改革的成果，他们希望[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰能更好地武装自己，击退软弱无能的异国信仰！

original: The old ways are still best

translation: 领土内少于§Y$NUM$§! 个§Y$CULTURE$§! 伯爵领
领土内至少有§Y$NUM$§!§Y$CULTURE$§!个伯爵领

original: Fewer than §Y$NUM$§! Counties within the §Y$TITLE$§! in Realm
translation: 小于§Y$TITLE$§! 领土内的§Y$NUM$§! 伯爵领数目

original: At least §Y$NUM$§! Counties within the §Y$TITLE$§! in Realm
translation: §Y$TITLE$§! 领土内至少有§Y$NUM$§! 伯爵领
§Y部落头衔§! （不能有法理上的封臣）

original: Tribal Titles do not and cannot have de jure vassal titles. If a tribal chief gains control of a proper title of the same or higher rank, the tribal title will be destroyed forever.
translation: 部落头衔不能同时拥有法理上的封臣头衔。如果部落的领导者得到一个相同或是更高的等级的正式头衔，这部落头衔就会永远消失。

original: Titular Titles do not have any de jure vassals under them. However, given time, vassal duchies and kingdoms can become their de jure vassals, making the titular title a 'proper' one.
translation: 名誉头衔没有任何法理上的封臣。然而，在特定的时间里，封臣的土地跟王国可以变成他们在法理上的封臣，让它变得「有名有实」。

original: §Y$CHAR$§!'s holdings in the §Y$TITLE$§! can NOT be taken through a Prepared Invasion
translation: §Y$TITLE$§!内§Y$CHAR$§!的领地不能通过准备入侵占有

original: §Y$CHAR$§!'s holdings in the §Y$TITLE$§! can be taken through a Prepared Invasion
translation: §Y$TITLE$§!内§Y$CHAR$§!的领地能通过准备入侵占有

original: §RThe Moral Authority of §Y$RELIGION$§R must be at least §Y$NEED$§!
§RYou only control §Y$CURRENT$§R of the §Y$RELIGION$§R holy sites, you need at least §Y$NEED$§!
translation: §R你当前只控制着§Y$CURRENT$§R个§Y$RELIGION$§R圣地，而你至少需要§Y$NEED$§!个

original: $PERC$: The Rebels Control all their Holdings
translation: $PERC$：叛军已经控制了他们所有的地盘

original: §Y'How the little piglets would grunt if they knew how the old boar suffered.'§! Those were the prophetic last words of the legendary viking §YRagnarr Loðbrok§! as he lay dying in the snake pit of Northumbrian king §YÆlla§!. In 867 the vengeful sons of Loðbrok and their 'Great Heathen Army' descended upon the petty kingdoms of Britain to make of §YÆlla§! a 'Blood Eagle'. Meanwhile, two other Norse lords - §YRurik§! and §YDyre§! - were carving out their own rival states among the Slavic and Finnish tribes of the East, laying down the foundations for what would one day become Russia. The Old Gods are still strong and their warriors mighty!
translation: §Y「小猪仔们所知老野猪受的折磨有多痛苦，他们的咆哮就有多愤怒。」§!这是传说中的海盗§Y朗纳尔·洛德布罗克§!奄奄一息地躺在诺森伯兰之王§Y埃拉§!的蛇穴中的最后一个预言。在867年，一心复仇的洛德布罗克诸子与他们的「异教大军」降临不列颠岛上的诸小王国，将§Y埃拉§!做成了「血鹰」。同时，另外两个诺斯之王——§Y留里克§!跟§Y底雷§!——在东方的斯拉夫和芬兰各部落中开创了他们相互敌视的国家，奠定了来日俄罗斯的根基。这时候古旧的神灵依然根深蒂固，他们的军队强悍无比！

original: The Magyar tribes have travelled far and fought viciously against nomads, farmers and city dwellers alike. The fertile plains of the Carpathian basin may offer us peace and succor - a new homeland at last...
translation: 马扎尔部落已经远征多年，他们对游牧民，农民，以及城市居民发起过恶斗。喀尔巴阡盆地的肥沃平原应该会给我们带来和平——终于有了新家……

original: With our capital in León, the kingdom will shift its political impetus away from Asturias and the periphery towards the heartlands of the Iberian peninsula.
translation: 在我们迁都到莱昂以后，帝国就将其政治重心从伊比利亚半岛的边缘阿斯图里亚斯转移到半岛的中心。

original: I can choose to embrace the Reformed form of the old faith - perhaps better late than never...
translation: 我可以去接纳改革后的古老信仰，为时未晚……

original: My position as regent to [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] would allow me to lower the Crown Authority in the [Root.PrimaryTitle.Kingdom.GetName]...
translation: 作为[Root.Liege.GetTitledName]的摄政，我可以在[Root.PrimaryTitle.Kingdom.GetName]降低王权……

original: My regent, [From.GetTitledName], has managed to push through a law lowering the Crown Authority in the [Root.PrimaryTitle.Kingdom.GetName]!
translation: 我的摄政[From.GetTitledName]通过了一部降低[Root.PrimaryTitle.Kingdom.GetName]王权的法律！

original: My position as regent to [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] would allow me to lower the Crown Authority in the [Root.PrimaryTitle.Empire.GetName]...
translation: 作为一个[Root.Liege.GetTitledName]的统治者会我可以降低[Root.PrimaryTitle.Empire.GetName]的王权……

original: My regent, [From.GetTitledName], has managed to push through a law lowering the Crown Authority in the [Root.PrimaryTitle.Empire.GetName]!
translation: 我的统治者[From.GetTitledName]已经准备推行一部法律来降低[Root.PrimaryTitle.Empire.GetName]的王权！

original: I am crowned King of Hungary

The Magyar tribes have travelled far and fought viciously against nomads, farmers and city dwellers alike. The fertile plains of the Carpathian basin may offer us peace and succor - a new homeland at last!
translation: 马扎尔部落正在远征，他们对游牧民、农民和市民发起战争。喀尔巴阡盆地的肥沃平原应该会给我们带来和平和帮助。总算找到一个新家了！
我们再也不需要逃跑了！
不再有马扎尔游牧民了

original: The King of the Magyars, [From.GetFirstName], has decided to settle down in the Carpathian basin, making it the new homeland of the Magyar tribes.
translation: 马扎尔人的领袖 [From.GetFirstName]已经决定在喀尔巴阡盆地定居，让这块土地成为马扎尔部落的新家园。

original: Let this be the dawn of a new era!
translation: 让这成为新时代的开端吧！

original: Asturias or León... what's the difference?
translation: 阿斯图里亚斯还是莱昂……有什么不同？

original: With the end of Carolingian domination of West Francia, the realm is now more commonly referred to as the Kingdom of France.
translation: 在加洛林对西法兰克的统治宣告结束后，这片土地现在被更多的人称为法兰西王国。

original: With the end of Carolingian domination of East Francia, the realm is now more commonly referred to as the Kingdom of Germany.
translation: 在加洛林对东法兰克的统治宣告结束后，这片土地现在被更多的人称为德意志王国。

original: s concubine and not truly married. However, any children she bears him will be considered legitimate.
translation: 的侍妾，并没有真正的结婚，但她生下来的孩子也有合法继承权。

original: §Y$CONSORT$§! will no longer be a concubine of §Y$WHO$§!.\n
Is the Reformed version of §Y$RELIGION$§! Religion
Is NOT the Reformed version of §Y$RELIGION$§! Religion
The §Y$TITLE$§! becomes the primary title of §Y$HOLDER$§!\n
The §Y[Religion.GetName]§! faith does not permit the taking of concubines
§Y[GetTitledFirstName]§! is of too lowly rank for such a highborn concubine
translation: §Y[GetTitledFirstName]§! 作为一个出身名门的侍妾地位太低了

original: Will not join religious enemies against brothers of the Faith
translation: 不能帮别的宗教的敌人去攻打和自己同宗教的兄弟

original: Concubines can only marry their liege
translation: 侍妾只能跟她的领主结婚

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! is not preparing to invade you
No valid target Kingdom where §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! controls between §Y$MIN$§! and §Y$MAX$§! Holdings
translation: 没有找到§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!控制着§Y$MIN$§!到§Y$MAX$§!个之间领地的王国作为有效目标

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! is not a [Actor.Religion.GetName] de jure vassal
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! 不能是一个在你法理领土内的[Actor.Religion.GetName]封臣

original: §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§! must have no more than §Y$NUM$§! Holdings in the Realm
translation: §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§!在此领地内不得超过 §Y$NUM$§! 个地产

original: We are preparing to invade §Y$TARGET$§! before §Y$DATE$§!
translation: 在 §Y$DATE$§! 前我们正准备入侵§Y$TARGET$§!

original: Enemy rulers are preparing invasions against us:\n$LIST$
translation: 敌方统治者正准备入侵我国：\n$LIST$

original: As enemy soldiers stream into the room, I have no choice but to surrender. I am at the mercy of [New.GetTitledName].
translation: 敌军已经攻进来了，我别无选择，只能投降，我只能任[New.GetTitledName]随便摆布。

original: [From.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] forgive me, I have decided to find salvation in [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] and convert to the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith! I hope we can put this unpleasantness behind us forthwith.\n\n[From.GetTitledName]
translation: [From.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]原谅我，我已经决定改信[Root.Religion.GetName]，从[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]中寻找救赎！我希望我们可以放下这些不愉快。\n\n[From.GetTitledName]

original: Like Ahura Mazda and Spandarmad at the time of creation, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetPossPronoun] [GetFromVsNewRelation] [New.GetTitledFirstName] have gotten married under the blessed auspices of Xwedodah, ensuring fullness and Order. We can collect a Royal Aid Duty to pay for the ceremonies.
translation: 和创世时的阿胡拉·马兹达和斯潘达马德一样，[From.GetTitledFirstName]和[From.GetPossPronoun][GetFromVsNewRelation][New.GetTitledFirstName]在徽多达赫（血亲圣婚）的吉兆下成婚，确保了将来的富足和秩序。我们可以用皇家援助的名义来收税以负担这个典礼的费用。

original: The peasants have risen up in [Root.GetName], led by a disgruntled former soldier. The rebels have the nerve to demand independence!
translation: 在一个心怀不满的退役士兵带领下，[Root.GetName]的农民揭竿而起。叛军谋求独立！

original: The peasants have risen up in [From.GetName], led by a disgruntled former soldier. The rebels have the nerve to demand independence!
translation: 在一个心怀不满的退役士兵带领下，[From.GetName]的农民揭竿而起。叛军谋求独立！

original: Even more peasants have risen up in [Root.GetName], reinforcing the ongoing revolt!
translation: 更多农民在[Root.GetName]起义，对叛乱火上添油！

original: Even more peasants have risen up in [From.GetName], reinforcing the ongoing revolt!
translation: 更多的农民已经在[From.GetName]叛乱，对如火如荼的叛乱火上添油！

original: [Root.Religion.GetName] heretics have risen up in [Root.GetName], led by a militant fanatic. If not swiftly crushed, this revolt could spread like wildfire!
translation: 在一群武装起来的狂信者带领下，异端[Root.Religion.GetName]在[Root.GetName]叛乱，如果不尽快镇压的话，星星之火，可以燎原！

original: [From.Religion.GetName] heretics have risen up in [From.GetName], led by a militant fanatic. If not swiftly crushed, this revolt could spread like wildfire!
translation: 在一群武装起来的狂信者带领下，异端[From.Religion.GetName]在[From.GetName]叛乱，如果不尽快镇压的话，星星之火，可以燎原！

original: Another mob of raving heretics have risen up in [Root.GetName], reinforcing the ongoing uprising!
translation: 又一群胡言乱语的异端暴民在[Root.GetName]爆发叛乱，对如火如荼的叛乱火上添油！

original: Another mob of raving heretics have risen up in [From.GetName], reinforcing the ongoing uprising!
translation: 又一群胡言乱语的异端暴民在 [From.GetName]爆发叛乱，对如火如荼的叛乱火上添油！

original: A dangerous revolt has broken out in [Root.GetName]. Many prominent [Root.Culture.GetName] landholders have raised an army of peasants, trained and led by a core of proper soldiers. They seek to restore the [Root.Kingdom.GetFullBaseName]!
translation: 一场危险的叛乱已经在[Root.GetName]爆发。许多有权势的[Root.Culture.GetName]地主已经组织起了一支支由农民组成的军队，经过训练后就由一队职业士兵领导。他们企图恢复[Root.Kingdom.GetFullBaseName]！

original: A dangerous revolt has broken out in [From.GetName]. Many prominent [From.Culture.GetName] landholders have raised an army of peasants, trained and led by a core of proper soldiers. They seek to restore the [From.Kingdom.GetFullBaseName]!
translation: 一场危险的暴动已经在[From.GetName]爆发。许多有权势的[From.Culture.GetName]地主已经组织起了一支由农民组成的军队，经过训练后就由一队职业士兵领导。他们企图恢复[From.Kingdom.GetFullBaseName]！

original: More [Root.Culture.GetName] rebels have taken up arms in [Root.GetName], joining the struggle to restore the [Root.Kingdom.GetFullBaseName]!
translation: 更多的[Root.Culture.GetName]叛乱者已经在[Root.GetName]拿起武器，加入到[Root.Kingdom.GetFullBaseName]的独立运动！

original: More [From.Culture.GetName] rebels have taken up arms in [From.GetName], joining the struggle to restore the [From.Kingdom.GetFullBaseName]!
translation: 更多的[From.Culture.GetName]叛乱者已经在[From.GetName]拿起武器，加入到[From.Kingdom.GetFullBaseName]的独立运动！

original: News has reached court that a claimant to my titles, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is hiring men for an attack against me!
translation: 消息已经到达宫中，我的头衔的一位宣称者，[From.GetTitledFirstName]正在聘请别人攻击我！

original: Oh dear, I hope [From.GetSheHe] is not prone to... accidents.
translation: 我的天，希望[From.GetSheHe]不要遭遇……意外。

original: After years of careful planning, [From.GetDynName] has raised a large army of exiles, mercenaries and hopefuls, declaring [From.GetPossPronoun] intention to press [From.GetPossPronoun] claim by force.
translation: 在多年的精心准备后，[From.GetDynName]已经组织起了一支庞大的，由流亡者、雇佣兵等组成的军队，宣称[From.GetPossPronoun]意图，并动用武力以索取[From.GetPossPronoun]宣称。

original: After years of careful planning, [FromFrom.GetDynName] from the court of [From.GetTitledName] has raised a large army of exiles, mercenaries and hopefuls, declaring [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] intention to press [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] claim by force.
translation: 在多年的精心准备后，来自[From.GetTitledName]宫廷的[FromFrom.GetDynName]已经组织起了一支庞大的，由流亡者、雇佣兵等组成的军队，宣称[FromFrom.GetPossPronoun]意图，并动用武力以索取[FromFrom.GetPossPronoun]宣称。

original: Word has reached me that an ambitious adventurer, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is gathering men for some sort of attack on my territory!
translation: 我已经收到信息，一个叫[From.GetTitledFirstName]的有抱负的冒险者正在组织部队进攻我的领土！

original: After years of careful planning, [From.GetDynName] has raised a large army of exiles, mercenaries and hopefuls, declaring [From.GetPossPronoun] intention to go off and carve out a realm of [From.GetPossPronoun] own...
translation: 在多年的精心准备后，[From.GetDynName]已经组建出了一支庞大的，由流亡者、雇佣兵等组成的军队，宣布[From.GetPossPronoun]进军意向，建立属于[From.GetPossPronoun]地盘……

original: After years of careful planning, [FromFrom.GetDynName] from the court of [From.GetTitledName] has raised a large army of exiles, mercenaries and hopefuls, declaring [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] intention to go off and carve out a realm of [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] own...
translation: 在多年的精心准备后，来自[From.GetTitledName]宫廷的[FromFrom.GetDynName]已经组建出了一支庞大的，由流亡者、雇佣兵等组成的军队，宣布[FromFrom.GetPossPronoun]进军意向，建立属于[FromFrom.GetPossPronoun]地盘……

original: §YYou have been at peace for too long!§!
As a §Y$RELIGION$ Pagan§!, you lose §R$PRESTIGE$§! Prestige every month for being at peace and doing no raiding.
translation: 作为一个§Y$RELIGION$§!原始宗教信徒，如果你处于和平或是不去劫掠的话，每月会减少 §R$PRESTIGE$§! 威望。

original: Since §Y[ActorExtra.GetFirstName]§! is §Y[RecipientExtra.GetFirstName]'s§! $RELATION$, it would be a sacred §YXwedodah§! union, pleasing to vassal Zoroastrians.
translation: 既然§Y[ActorExtra.GetFirstName]§!是§Y[RecipientExtra.GetFirstName]的§!$RELATION$，这将是神圣的§Y徽多达赫§!（血亲圣婚）结合，受到祆教封臣们欢迎。

original: Peasant leaders sometimes rise up and try to 'liberate' their county from oppression.
translation: 农民领袖有时会反叛并试图将他们的省份从压迫中「解放」出来。

original: Heretic leaders - heresiarchs - can rise up if the authority of the parent religion is low, spreading their errant beliefs with fire and sword.
translation: 在正统宗教的宗教权威低下时，异端头目会发动叛乱并以火与剑来传播他们的歪理邪说。

original: This character is the leader of a fanatic and militant heretic sect.
translation: 这名角色是异端极端激进宗派的头目。
什叶派哈里发王位觊觎者

original: Ambitious characters of noble descent can go off and attempt to seize duchies in foreign lands with a band of adventurers.
translation: 拥有野心的贵族后人可以出走并在一群投机冒险之徒的支持下试图在异国土地上攫取数个公国。

original: The subjects of foreign lords can rise up in revolt and try to restore their old kingdom.
translation: 外国君主统治下的臣民会试图起义重建旧王国

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! takes or vassalizes all titles held by §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! within the §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§!.\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! 夺取了 §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! 在 §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§!的所有头衔。\n

original: For §Y200§! Piety, Caliphs are allowed to subjugate all other Muslim rulers of the same denomination once per §Y10§! years.
translation: 每 §Y10§! 年，哈里发可以花费§Y200§!虔诚来征服一个同教派的穆斯林领主。

original: Muslims can conquer single border counties without specific reasons at the cost of §Y50§! Piety.
translation: 穆斯林可以花费§Y50§!虔诚而无需特殊理由征服一个接壤的省份。

original: Norse Pagans can declare their intention to invade all the territory held by a sufficiently powerful target within a given de jure kingdom. This will swell their ranks with adventurers, but they must attack within two years.
translation: 诺斯原始宗教徒能宣布将一个足够强大的目标在指定法理王国内所持有的全部领土作为入侵对象的意图。这将吸引来无数冒险者让他们的军队数量膨胀，但他们必须在两年内发动攻击。

original: Reformed Pagans can use this Casus Belli to seize all titles held by an infidel within a de jure Duchy at the cost of §Y100§! $PIETYNAME$.
translation: 改革原始宗教信徒可以花费 §Y100§! $PIETYNAME$来夺取一名异教徒在一个法理公国内持有的全部头衔。

original: You cannot play a Pagan or Zoroastrian without The Old Gods DLC
translation: 你没有安装「逝往神灵」DLC，不能使用原始宗教或祆教国家

original: Prepare to invade an independent ruler
translation: 准备入侵一个独立领主

original: Prestigious rulers can, once in their lifetime, prepare invasions before they declare war. During the next two years, many adventurers and opportunists may flock to your banner, especially against a powerful target. However, if you fail to launch your attack in two years' time, you will lose face.
translation: 声威卓著的领主一生中只有一次机会在宣战前准备入侵。在准备入侵的两年里，会有大量的甘于冒险投机之徒汇聚在你的战旗之下，你的目标越富有强大人数就在你旗下之人就越多。但若你在两年之后没有发动入侵，你将会为此颜面扫地。

original: In the name of the Allfather, the Hanged One, the Flaming Eye, I declare my intention to invade your lands and subjugate your people. Richly shall the ravens feast!\n\n[From.GetTitledName]
translation: 以众神之父、倒吊之神、燃烧之眼的名义，我宣布我将入侵你的土地、征服你的人民。渡鸦的盛宴！\n\n[From.GetTitledName]

original: Better arms and armor for Light infantry and Archers.
translation: 给轻步兵和弓箭手装备更好的武器和护甲。

original: Better arms and armor for Heavy infantry and Pikemen.
translation: 给重步兵和长枪兵装备更好的武器和护甲。

original: Better arms and armor for Light cavalry, Heavy cavalry and Horse archers.
translation: 给轻骑兵，重骑兵和弓骑兵装备更好的武器和护甲。

original: Better shipbuilding techniques allow us to field a bigger fleet.
translation: 更先进的造船技术允许我们部署更加庞大的舰队。

original: Better trade practices lead to more money for republics as well as cities participating in trade.
translation: 更优越的贸易制度让共和国和城市能在贸易中赚更多的钱。

original: Better building techniques make construction cheaper and faster.
translation: 更先进的建筑学使建造变得更效率。

original: Acceptance of the ways of others makes it easier to rule over people of different cultures and religions.
translation: 海纳百川更易于统治不同的文化和宗教。

original: By spending §Y$POINTS$§! $POINTTYPE$ you can increase this technology to level §Y$NEXTLEVEL$§!
translation: 通过花费 §Y$POINTS$§! $POINTTYPE$你能够提升这项科技到等级 §Y$NEXTLEVEL$§!

original: Advancements in your Capital county of $PROV$
translation: 你首都省份$PROV$的科技先进度

original: Dark blue is the lowest and white is the highest level of advancement currently in the world.
translation: 目前世界上的科技先进度，深蓝是最低等级，白色是最高等级。
基础军事科技点数成长
基础经济科技点数成长
基础文化科技点数成长

original: Counts do not generate technology points
translation: 伯爵领不会产生科技点

original: §YYou should Invest in a Technological Advance§!
You have enough Technology Points in a Technology Group to invest in any of its advances
translation: 你在一个科技组有足够的科技点的时候就可以用来提前点开科技

original: Removes the Pagan Homeland attrition penalty
translation: 移除原始宗教家乡损耗惩罚

original: Trade Practices Technology is too low to build Trade Posts
translation: 贸易制度科技不足以建造贸易站

original: Allows the construction of Trade Posts

translation: 掠夺所有被占领的地产

original: Looting will destroy Trade Posts, raze buildings and sometimes even entire small Holdings.
translation: 掠夺将摧毁贸易站，毁坏建筑有时甚至整个地产。

original: Your Religion does not allow looting

Owned by an enemy who is not §Y$RELIGION$§!
  Controlled by you
  Does not have the §YLooted§! Penalty
translation:
被不是§Y$RELIGION$§!的敌人拥有
由你控制
没有§YLooted§!惩罚

original: §Y$SETTLEMENTS$§! Holdings in §Y$PROVINCE$§! have been looted by §Y$LOOTER$§!
Raiders under §Y$RAIDER$§! have arrived to loot and pillage in §Y$VICTIM$'s§! county of §Y$PROVINCE$§!
translation: §Y$RAIDER$§!带领下的劫掠者已到来，正抢劫掠夺§Y$VICTIM$§!的省份§Y$PROVINCE$§!

original: The dragon bows of longships have been sighted off the coast of §Y$PROVINCE$§! as vikings under the fierce heathen §Y$RAIDER$§! begin to pillage and loot the county!
translation: 装饰着龙竖像的长船出现在§Y$PROVINCE$§!海岸，§Y$RAIDER$§!旗下凶猛的异教徒开始掠夺此省份！

original: A fleet $AMOUNT$ has returned from raiding. §Y$OWNER$§! gains §Y$GOLD$§! gold and §Y$PRESTIGE$§! prestige
translation: 一支$AMOUNT$的舰队劫掠后返回。§Y$OWNER$§!获得了 §Y$GOLD$§! 金钱和 §Y$PRESTIGE$§! 威望

original: Looters have destroyed the trade post in $PROVINCE$
translation: 掠夺者破坏了在$PROVINCE$的贸易站

original: Holding does not have the §YLooted§! Penalty
translation: 地产没有 §Y被劫掠§! 惩罚

original: This fleet is carrying §Y$LOOT$§!/§Y$MAX$§!¤ in loot. Move it to a friendly port to add the gold to your treasury
translation: 这支舰队携带 §Y$LOOT$§!/§Y$MAX$§!¤ 战利品。移动到友方港口以使这些钱进入国库。

original: Any gold this unit loots will be loaded onto a fleet in $SEA$. The fleet must return home to secure the gold.
translation: 这个单位掠夺的金钱将会运到在$SEA$的舰队上。舰队必须返航才能取得金钱。

original: Any gold this unit loots will be added to its owner's treasury directly, since it borders the owner's realm.
translation: 这个单位掠夺的金钱将会直接增加它所有者的财富，因为它在所有者领地的边境。

original: Own neighbouring Province or fleet with space for loot in neighbouring Sea or River
translation: 拥有相邻省份或者相邻海域/河流中有空载的舰队

original: Province does not border the realm of the unit's owner, nor are there any friendly ships nearby.
translation: 省份没有与单位所有者的领土相连或者附近没有友军船只。

original: All loot in this Province is currently guarded by forts.
translation: 这个省份的所有战利品现在被要塞保护着。

original: Province has loot that is unprotected by forts
translation: 省份有不处于要塞保护的战利品

original: You have no Unit standing in the Province
translation: 你没有单位驻扎在省份

original: Has a Unit standing in the Province
translation: 有一个单位驻扎在省份

original: This is a Concubinage. Children of concubines, though of slightly lower social status, inherit normally and will be of the father's Dynasty.
translation: 这是妾侍制度。妾所生下的孩子尽管社会地位较低，但是仍有正常的继承权并且属于父亲的家族。

original: Settle a divorce with §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! for §R$GOLD$§!¤. [Recipient.GetHerHisCap] close relatives will be insulted (§R$OPINION$§! opinion).
translation: 付出 §R$GOLD$§!¤ 来和§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!离婚。[Recipient.GetHerHisCap]近亲将会受到侮辱（§R$OPINION$§! 好感度）。

original: This character was born to the concubine of a ruler. Children of concubines can inherit but are somewhat poorly regarded by others.
translation: 这名角色是统治者的庶子。庶子有继承权但是被他人轻视。

original: That vile brute [From.GetBestName] has forced me to become his concubine!
translation: 那下流的畜生[From.GetBestName]强迫我成为他的侍妾！

original: [FromFrom.GetBestName] has forced my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetBestName] to become his concubine!
[FromFrom.GetBestName] has forced my wife [From.GetBestName] to become his concubine!
translation: [FromFrom.GetBestName]强迫我的妻子[From.GetBestName]成为他的侍妾！

original: I have decided to accept your suggestion to make [Root.GetTitledFirstName] into your concubine.
translation: 我已经决定接受你的建议让[Root.GetTitledFirstName]成为你的侍妾。

original: I reject your insulting suggestion. [Root.GetTitledFirstName] will never become your concubine.
translation: 我拒绝你无礼的建议。[Root.GetTitledFirstName]永远不会成为你的侍妾。

original: [FromFrom.Mother.GetFirstName] has borne the child of another man! I cannot believe this betrayal!
translation: [FromFrom.Mother.GetFirstName]生了另一个男人的小孩！我无法相信这次背叛！

original: I am surely with child... my lord will be pleased.
translation: 我肯定怀孕了……我的领主会很开心的。

original: Oh dear, I must be with child. Will my lord believe it is his?
translation: 哎呀，我一定怀孕了。我的领主会相信是他的种吗？

original: Fate smiles upon me, my concubine [From.GetFirstName] is pregnant!
translation: 命运向我微笑，我的侍妾[From.GetFirstName]怀孕了！

original: Tell [Root.FatherOfUnborn.GetFirstName] he will be a father

The 'Holy Orders' tab lists the great religious knighthoods. They can be employed like mercenaries, but instead of gold, it will cost you [Player.Religion.GetPietyName] to raise them. However, you will still have to pay for their maintenance. The Holy Orders appear on their historical foundation dates, and will only fight against heretics and infidels.
translation: 「骑士团」标签页列出了伟大的宗教战士。他们能够像雇佣军那样雇佣，不过征召他们需要花费[Player.Religion.GetPietyName]而不是金钱。尽管如此你依然要支付他们的维护费。骑士团的出现以他们历史上的时间为基准。

original: Holy orders will only fight against heretics and infidels. Be careful when using them in battle!
translation: 骑士团只能与异端和异教徒战斗。请在战斗中小心地使用他们

original: Your invasion plans against [From.GetTitledName] are no longer possible. The invasion has failed before it even started...
translation: 你对抗[From.GetTitledName]的入侵计划不再有可能性。入侵在它开始前就已经失败了……

original: You have waited too long to launch your invasion against [From.GetTitledName]! Disgruntled, the hopeful warriors who had flocked to your banner wander off looking for better opportunities.
translation: 你等待时间太久了而不能发动你对抗[From.GetTitledName]的入侵计划！心怀不满而渴望成功战士们曾经聚集在你的麾下，如今离开寻找更好的机会。

original: Large numbers of adventurous carls have arrived from all corners of Scandinavia, hoping to join your great expedition against [From.GetTitledName]!
translation: 大量想冒险的粗鲁之人从斯堪的纳维亚的角角落落而来，希望加入你对抗[From.GetTitledName]的伟大远征！

original: A renowned hero has arrived at your court with his housecarls and followers, hoping to partake in your glorious invasion of [From.GetTitledName]!
translation: 一位著名的英雄与他的侍卫和追随者来到你的宫廷，希望参加你对抗[From.GetTitledName]的荣耀入侵战！

original: Make room at the high table!

There are great opportunities for plunder and glory in England, with the sons of Lodbrok exacting their vengeance on the Saxon kings. My Carls are growing restless, anxious to join the great adventure...
translation: 随着洛德布罗克的儿子们向撒克逊王的复仇，在英格兰有很大机会能获得战利品和荣耀。我那群粗鲁鬼们正在变得焦躁不安，渴望参加这次冒险……

original: The Raven will Fly over Mercia!
The Raven will Fly over Wessex!
translation: 乌鸦将在威塞克斯飞翔！

original: The Raven will Fly over Scotland!
In the name of the Allfather, the Hanged One, the Flaming Eye, I declare my intention to invade your lands and subjugate your people. Richly shall the ravens feast!\n\n[From.GetTitledName]
translation: 以众神之父、吊神、燃烧之眼的名义，我宣布我打算入侵你的领地，征服你的人民。乌鸦将饱餐一顿！\n\n[From.GetTitledName]

original: Brave Mongol warriors have poured through the Golden Gates of Kiev and sacked the once proud trading hub. The city has been left a smoldering ruin and the Dnieper now runs red with the blood of its former inhabitants.
translation: 勇猛的蒙古战士们涌入了基辅的金门，洗劫了这个曾经兴盛的贸易中心。城市只剩下冒烟的废墟，第聂伯河的河水现在被它先前居民的鲜血染红。

original: They shall never forget our might.
translation: 他们将永远牢记我们的力量。

original: Novgorod has been stormed by Mongol warriors and the city's inhabitants are now paying the ultimate price for their arrogance. The Cathedral of Saint Sophia is engulfed in flames as the warriors loot that which can be carried away and put the rest to the torch.
translation: 诺夫哥罗德被蒙古战士所席卷，这座巨城和它的人民正蒙受着无法估量的损失。草原战士们搬走了所有可以搬走的东西后，将圣索菲亚主教座堂付之一炬。

original: Mongol armies continue to push beyond the Vistula and into Poland. Krakow has now fallen to the skilled warriors, and it is said that at night the flames from the burning city can be seen from untold leagues away.
translation: 蒙古大军继续进军，越过维斯瓦河并攻入波兰。克拉科夫现已落入熟练的战士之手，据说方圆百里都可见夜空被城市的大火映如白昼。

original: Even Aachen, the former seat of Charlemagne's Carolingian empire, has fallen under the shadow of the great Mongol nation. His spirit must surely be weeping at the harsh punishment now being brought down on the decadent peasants within the city's walls.
translation: 即使是亚琛，查理曼的加洛林帝国前御座所在，也已落入大蒙古国的阴影之中。他的灵魂无疑在为城墙内加诸于无能农民身上的残酷惩罚而哭泣。

original: Like a swarm of locusts, the unstoppable Mongols have descended upon Paris and sacked the city. The still unfinished Notre Dame Cathedral is quickly set on fire and with the light provided by the rest of the burning city, the Mongol warriors can continue looting and murdering well into the night.
translation: 犹如蝗灾过境，不可阻挡的蒙古人攻陷了巴黎并洗劫了这座城市。尚未竣工的巴黎圣母院就如火海中的明烛，和燃烧的城市一起见证着日以继夜的抢掠和杀戮。

original: Not even the sea has proved a formidable enough barrier to halt the Mongol advance. London has fallen to the Mongol vanguard and the city is now the scene of a slaughter on a scale unrivaled since the days of Queen Boudica and her rebellion.
translation: 即使海洋也算不上是能阻止蒙古人推进的屏障。伦敦已落入蒙古兵锋之下。 城内上演着自布狄卡女王的起义以来都未曾见过的屠杀。

original: As is proper, Rome once more suffers at the just hands of warriors from the east. A Mongol army has breached the Aurelian Walls, and its horses are now grazing on the field of the Circus Maximus while the ranking officers raise their yurts on the Palatine Hill. As expected, no mercy is shown to those foolish Romans who have not yet fled the city.
translation: 理所当然地，罗马再一次落入了东方战士的正义之手。蒙古军队突破了奥勒良墙，正牧马于马克西姆斯竞技场，立寨于帕拉蒂尼山上。一如所料，对未来得及逃离的愚蠢罗马民众他们没有展示出任何怜悯。

original: The canals of Venice have been blocked by the bloated corpses of the dead as the city is sacked by frenzied Mongol warriors. Those few fortunate enough to have escaped the slaughter claim the bodies are packed tightly enough in the Venetian Lagoon for the Mongols to ride to and from the mainland as they please.
translation: 狂暴的蒙古战士洗劫了威尼斯，威尼斯的城市运河被尸体所淤塞。少数足够幸运得逃出屠杀的人声称，蒙古人用尸体将威尼斯潟湖填实以能在大陆与城市间任意驰骋。

original: The Theodosian Walls have not been enough to spare Constantinople from the deadly touch of the Mongol nation. The great imperial capital has been sacked, its citizens butchered or enslaved, the Hagia Sophia defiled and the Great Palace of the emperors put to the torch.
translation: 坚固的狄奥多西墙并未能使君士坦丁堡逃脱鞑靼之鞭的死亡之爪。这座传奇之城——色雷斯明珠已被洗劫，其子民或遭屠杀，或沦为奴隶，圣索菲亚大教堂惨遭亵渎，连富丽堂皇的皇宫也被付之一炬。

original: Our armies have now reached as far west as Lisbon in the quest to conquer the world for the great Mongol nation. While the city burns at the touch of our warriors, they look out over the great blue expanse of the Atlantic. Who can tell what lies beyond?
translation: 我们的军队已经将大蒙古国的征服扩展到了西至里斯本的地域。在这城市被我们的战士点燃后，他们将目光投向了蔚蓝的大西洋。谁能说出海的另一边是什么呢？

original: Smolensk has been swallowed up by the Mongol horde as it continues its relentless advance to the west. When the great host finally moves on, little remains of the city but ashes and charred rubble, and those lucky few inhabitants who somehow escaped the notice of the rampaging horsemen.
translation: 斯模棱斯克已被蒙古大军毫无怜悯的西征吞噬。兵锋过处，只余灰烬和残垣，间或逃过屠杀的幸存者于废墟间苟延残喘。

original: The city of Prague has indeed become a beacon of light in an otherwise dark world, as Mongol warriors move from house to house and set fire to everything not yet looted. A flood of refugees spread horrific tales about the cruelty and skill of the bloodthirsty Tartar horsemen to every corner of Europe.
translation: 蒙古战士挨家挨户放火烧毁那些来不及抢走的东西，布拉格城确实成为了黑暗世界中的明灯，毕竟这火光已经是唯一的光亮。难民潮将这些嗜血鞑靼骑兵的残忍与武艺的恐怖故事传向欧洲的每个角落。

original: Vienna, a city previously of growing importance on the Danube river, has become the latest target of the great Mongol armies as they continue to pillage and burn their way across Europe. The smoking ruins and arrow-riddled corpses they leave behind when they move on do not lend much faith in the city's future prospects.
translation: 维也纳，曾是多瑙河上的璀璨明珠，如今成为了蒙古部落在欧洲一路烧掠的最新目标。冒烟的废墟，插满箭簇的尸体，让人对这个城市的未来不抱期望。

original: The great Mongol horde has reached beyond the Carpathians and fanned out across the Great Hungarian Plain. Now the city of Esztergom has fallen to the murderous host and is the scene of indiscriminate slaughter. Those that attempt to flee on foot are cut down without mercy by the fast horsemen as dark, billowing smoke rises towards the sky above the city.
translation: 伟大的蒙古部落越过喀尔巴阡山，穿过匈牙利大平原。艾斯特根已陷嗜杀者之手，无差别的屠杀在这里上演。骑马的勇士追砍着任何企图逃跑的人，滚滚浓烟直冲云霄像是在为之呐喊。

original: The ancient city of Athens has fallen to the Mongols, and they now rampage unchecked behind its walls. Great monuments and artifacts dating back to the dawn of Western Civilisation are lost forever in a cultural desecration that will surely be felt by future generations thousands of years from now.
translation: 古老的雅典城已陷入蒙古人之手，如今他们在城墙后肆无忌惮地横冲直撞。追溯至西方文明黎明时期的不朽纪念碑和其他古迹一同毁灭，这种对文化的亵渎直到千年后也必将令人刻骨铭心。

original: The White City has turned red as the Mongol armies seize Belgrade and massacre the inhabitants without exception. After several days of slaughter and looting, the smell of death and rotting flesh proves too much even for our warriors to bear and they move their camp upwind from the scorched ruins of the city.
translation: 在蒙古军队攻克贝尔格莱德后无差别地屠杀居民之下，这座「白城」已经变成了红色。经过数日的屠杀和劫掠，尸体和腐肉的臭味已经让我们的勇士自己都无法忍受。他们移营到了已成焦土的城市的上风处。

original: The decadent city of Baghdad, supposedly one of the world's foremost centers of learning, has succumbed to the unstoppable Mongol armies after a siege. Now the Tigris river runs not only red with blood, but black with the ink of priceless and irreplaceable tomes from the House of Wisdom and the city's other great libraries.
translation: 衰败的城市巴格达，全世界最重要的学识中心之一，在围城后被不可阻挡的蒙古军队吞噬。底格里斯河不光被鲜血所染红，还被来自智慧之家与城内其他大图书馆的无价和不可替代的巨著的墨水所染黑。

original: Damascus, the ancient City of Jasmine, has been sacked by the advancing Mongols. Our warriors have gathered a colossal pile of severed heads on a field just outside the city walls, now renamed burj al-ru'us by the massacre's few survivors - the Tower of Heads.
translation: 大马士革，这座茉莉古城，被推进的蒙古人洗劫。我们的战士已经在城墙外的空地上用斩下的头颅堆积起一座巨大的小山，现在大屠杀为数不多的幸存者称之为 burj al-ru'us——断头之塔。

original: The great Mongol host has sacked Jerusalem, spurring a moment of rare solidarity between members of all the city's different religions as they suffer equal horrors under the righteous wrath of our warriors.
translation: 伟大的蒙古大军洗劫了耶路撒冷，让城里不同宗教的人罕见地团结起来，因为我们战士的正义怒火使他们面临着同等的恐怖。

original: Not content with our vast empire surpassing Alexander the Great's in sheer size, Mongol armies are now laying waste to the city that is his namesake as well. Pompey's Pillar has been toppled, but sadly the Pharos Lighthouse is spared when the our warriors deem it not worth the great effort it would require to raze it to the ground.
translation: 蒙古铁骑并不满足于我们的巨大帝国已经在纯粹的面积上超越了亚历山大帝国，他们现在正在劫掠这座以大帝之名命名的城市。庞培柱被推倒，但可惜亚历山大灯塔幸存了下来，因为我们的战士认为费力把它夷平并不值当。

original: Riding through the fertile Nile Delta, a Mongol army has arrived at the Great Pyramids of Giza and breached the gates of Cairo. Surely even the cruelest Pharaoh would be given pause by the pain and misery now inflicted on the city's decadent and foolish population.
translation: 一支蒙古部队在富饶的尼罗河三角洲上驰骋，到达了吉萨大金字塔并且攻破了开罗城门。即使是最残忍的法老看到这些被强加给城内颓废和愚蠢的人们的悲痛和苦难后也会停下脚步。

original: The Muslim Holy City of Mecca now burns at the hands of Mongol warriors. Pilgrims journeying from distant lands to show their submission to Allah are met only with death when approaching the city gates. This desecration will be remembered for ages to come, hopefully as an important lesson on the price of defying the powerful Mongol nation.
translation: 穆斯林的圣城麦加现在被蒙古战士们点燃了。从远方而来膜拜安拉的朝圣者在接近城门时等待他们的只有死亡。这次亵渎将百年难忘，希望给那些反抗强大的蒙古军队的城市上了重要的一课。

original: Commission a runestone to chronicle your exploits or the memory of a dead parent. This can be done only once in a lifetime, but others will look more favorably on you for a time.
translation: 委托制作一块符石来记录你的功绩或者对已故双亲的记忆。一生只能做一次，但是将对你一时更有利。

original: The craftsmen start the process of carving and painting the runestone.
translation: 工匠开始对符石雕刻和上色。

original: You will raise a runestone in honor of your own person.
translation: 你立起一块符石荣耀你自己。

original: You have decided to commission and raise a grand runestone for future generations to gaze upon. What should be carved into it?
translation: 你决定委托制作并且立起一块宏伟的符石以供子孙后代凝望。该往上雕刻什么呢？

original: It shall stand in memory of [Root.Father.GetTitledFirstName], my departed father.
translation: 它应该为纪念[Root.Father.GetTitledFirstName]——我故去的父亲而立。

original: It shall stand in memory of [Root.Mother.GetTitledFirstName], my beloved mother.
translation: 它应该为纪念[Root.Mother.GetTitledFirstName]——我故去的母亲而立。

original: The artisans who will carve and paint the runestone are asking for instructions. Which of your qualities should it speak of?
translation: 雕刻和绘制符石的工匠们正在请求指令。它应该记述你的哪种品格呢？

original: Oh, I don't know. Make something up.
I know exactly what the stone should say...
translation: 我清楚地知道符石应该说些什么……

original: It schall shpeak of mead, schpirits, *hic* and other ssusch wondersch.
translation: 因该唆蟹蜂米酒、烈酒、*嗝*还还还有起它则羊的好东习。

original: It must share my beauty with the world.
translation: 它必须与世界分享我的美丽。

original: Let it show what a giant I was despite my stature.
translation: 让它展现我多么高大尽管我的身材这样。
我的智慧必须保存下来。

original: The runes must say that I had the strength of ten men!
translation: 符文必须述说我能以一当十！

original: My great knowledge of the world.
translation: 我拥有世界上最伟大的知识。

original: I care not what you write, but it must show my impaled enemies!
translation: 我不关心你写什么，但它必须表现那些被我刺穿的敌人！

original: It should speak of summer fields, moonlit nights and...
translation: 它应该述说夏天的田野，月明的夜晚和……

original: Just carve in my image and make sure it is well-endowed.
translation: 就雕上我的形象并且要保证完美无缺。

original: Carve in all of my favorite recipes.
It should mention the importance of being kind to others.
translation: 它应该提到对别人友善的重要性。

original: You will mention my greatness and the epic deeds I have performed.
translation: 你将会提起我的伟大和我做过的史诗般的事迹。

original: Oh, there is not much to say...
It will say that I feared nothing.
I wish to be known for my fairness in all things.
translation: 我希望以我万事公正为名。
我苛刻而又必要的行动。

original: The demon within me must be heard.
translation: 我体内恶魔的声音必须得到聆听。

original:
The runestone you commissioned has been finished and raised on the spot you chose for it. You examine the runes:

This stone was raised by [Root.GetFirstName] in memory of [Root.Father.GetFirstName], [Root.GetHerHis] father and [Root.Father.Father.GetFirstName]'s son. He lived a good life and died peacefully in bed. Ever will stand this memorial.

You leave the stone, content in the knowledge that many centuries from now, when its paint has long since faded, scholars will be studying these rune carvings in an effort to glean the wisdom of their words.
translation:
定做的符文石已完成并树立在你指定的地点。你细读符文：

[Root.GetFirstName]树立此石以纪念[Root.Father.GetFirstName]，即[Root.GetHerHis]父亲，[Root.Father.Father.GetFirstName]的儿子。他生前过着美好的生活，并且寿终正寝。此碑永不倒。

你满意地离开了这块石头，知道即便几个世纪过去，石上的颜色早已斑驳，学者们也会研究此符文的刻画，只求一窥其话语中蕴藏的智慧。

original:
The runestone you commissioned has been finished and raised on the spot you chose for it. You examine the runes:

This stone was raised by [Root.GetFirstName] in memory of [Root.Father.GetFirstName], [Root.GetHerHis] father and [Root.Father.Father.GetFirstName]'s son. He died bravely in battle against his foes, axe firmly in hand. Ever will stand this memorial.

You leave the stone, content in the knowledge that many centuries from now, when its paint has long since faded, scholars will be studying these rune carvings in an effort to glean the wisdom of their words.
translation:
定做的符文石已完成并树立在你指定的地点。你细读符文：

[Root.GetFirstName]树立此石以纪念[Root.Father.GetFirstName]，[Root.GetHerHis]父亲，[Root.Father.Father.GetFirstName]的儿子。他在与敌人的战斗中英勇牺牲，死前他还牢牢地握住他的战斧。此碑永不倒。

你满意地离开了这块石头，知道即便几个世纪过去，石上的颜色早已斑驳，学者们也会研究此符文的刻画，只求一窥其话语中蕴藏的智慧。

This stone was raised by [Root.GetFirstName] in memory of [Root.Father.GetFirstName], [Root.GetHerHis] father and [Root.Father.Father.GetFirstName]'s son. He was unjustly denied a death in battle, and his life was instead taken by the cowardly hangman. Ever will stand this memorial.

You leave the stone, content in the knowledge that many centuries from now, when its paint has long since faded, scholars will be studying these rune carvings in an effort to glean the wisdom of their words.
translation:
定做的符文石已完成并树立在你指定的地点。你细读符文：

[Root.GetFirstName]树立此石以纪念[Root.Father.GetFirstName]，[Root.GetHerHis]父亲，[Root.Father.Father.GetFirstName]的儿子。他没能在战场拼杀中公平战死，而是被懦弱的刽子手所杀害。此碑永不倒。

你满意地离开了这块石头，知道即便几个世纪过去，石上的颜色早已斑驳，学者们也会研究此符文的刻画，只求一窥其话语中蕴藏的智慧。

The runestone you commissioned has been finished and raised on the spot you chose for it. You examine the runes:

This stone was raised by [Root.GetFirstName] in memory of [Root.Father.GetFirstName], [Root.GetHerHis] father and [Root.Father.Father.GetFirstName]'s son. He was murdered in cold-blood by his jealous enemies. May his killer one day know justice. Ever will stand this memorial.

You leave the stone, content in the knowledge that many centuries from now, when its paint has long since faded, scholars will be studying these rune carvings in an effort to glean the wisdom of their words.
translation:
定做的符文石已完成并树立在你指定的地点。你细读符文：

[Root.GetFirstName]树立此石以纪念[Root.Father.GetFirstName]，[Root.GetHerHis]父亲，[Root.Father.Father.GetFirstName]的儿子。他被妒嫉着他的冷血敌人谋杀了。但愿有一天凶手能够得到公正的裁决。此碑永不倒。

你满意地离开了这块石头，知道即便几个世纪过去，石上的颜色早已斑驳，学者们也会研究此符文的刻画，只求一窥其话语中蕴藏的智慧。

original:
The runestone you commissioned has been finished and raised on the spot you chose for it. You examine the runes:

This stone was raised by [Root.GetFirstName] in memory of [Root.Father.GetFirstName], [Root.GetHerHis] father and [Root.Father.Father.GetFirstName]'s son. He was taken from this world before his time had come in a tragic accident. Ever will stand this memorial.

You leave the stone, content in the knowledge that many centuries from now, when its paint has long since faded, scholars will be studying these rune carvings in an effort to glean the wisdom of their words.
translation:
定做的符文石已完成并树立在你指定的地点。你细读符文：

[Root.GetFirstName]树立此石以纪念[Root.Father.GetFirstName]，[Root.GetHerHis]父亲，[Root.Father.Father.GetFirstName]的儿子。他在大限将至之前便死于一场不幸的意外事故。此碑永不倒。

你满意地离开了这块石头，知道即便几个世纪过去，石上的颜色早已斑驳，学者们也会研究此符文的刻画，只求一窥其话语中蕴藏的智慧。

original:
The runestone you commissioned has been finished and raised on the spot you chose for it. You examine the runes:

This stone was raised by [Root.GetFirstName] in memory of [Root.Father.GetFirstName], [Root.GetHerHis] father and [Root.Father.Father.GetFirstName]'s son. He perished while locked away in a dark dungeon, out of sight but not forgotten. Ever will stand this memorial.

You leave the stone, content in the knowledge that many centuries from now, when its paint has long since faded, scholars will be studying these rune carvings in an effort to glean the wisdom of their words.
translation:
定做的符文石已完成并树立在你指定的地点。你细读符文：

[Root.GetFirstName]树立此石以纪念[Root.Father.GetFirstName]，[Root.GetHerHis]父亲，[Root.Father.Father.GetFirstName]的儿子。他的生命在黑暗的地牢里枯萎了，虽然他远离尘世，但他并没有被人忘记。此碑永不倒。

你满意地离开了这块石头，知道即便几个世纪过去，石上的颜色早已斑驳，学者们也会研究此符文的刻画，只求一窥其话语中蕴藏的智慧。

original:
The runestone you commissioned has been finished and raised on the spot you chose for it. You examine the runes:

This stone was raised by [Root.GetFirstName] in memory of [Root.Father.GetFirstName], [Root.GetHerHis] father and [Root.Father.Father.GetFirstName]'s son. He met his end in an effort to please the Old Gods. May they suffer his presence so that we do not have to. Ever will stand this memorial.

You leave the stone, content in the knowledge that many centuries from now, when its paint has long since faded, scholars will be studying these rune carvings in an effort to glean the wisdom of their words.
translation:
定做的符文石已完成并树立在你指定的地点。你细读符文：

[Root.GetFirstName]树立此石以纪念[Root.Father.GetFirstName]，即[Root.GetHerHis]父亲，[Root.Father.Father.GetFirstName]的儿子。他在人生的终点努力去侍奉古神。但愿他们容许他的灵魂而我们不用。能够此碑永不倒。

你满意地离开了这块石头，知道即便几个世纪过去，石上的颜色早已斑驳，学者们也会研究此符文的刻画，只求一窥其话语中蕴藏的智慧。

original:
The runestone you commissioned has been finished and raised on the spot you chose for it. You examine the runes:

This stone was raised by [Root.GetFirstName] in memory of [Root.Father.GetFirstName], [Root.GetHerHis] father and [Root.Father.Father.GetFirstName]'s son. His untimely death came in an epic hólmganga that will long be remembered. Ever will stand this memorial.

You leave the stone, content in the knowledge that many centuries from now, when its paint has long since faded, scholars will be studying these rune carvings in an effort to glean the wisdom of their words.
translation:

防御型宗教在家园土地内

original: New land has been sighted across the sea to the west of Iceland! While sailing to Reykjavik from Norway, Gunnbjørn Ulfsson and his crew were blown off course and came upon several skerries lying off the coast of a much larger island – possibly a new continent.\n\nWhile Gunnbjørn did not go ashore, the land seems to be unclaimed and unsettled. Sailors in Iceland have vowed to investigate this discovery further.
translation: 在冰岛西方的大海彼岸发现了一片新的陆地！贡比约恩，武尔夫松及其船员在从挪威往雷克雅未克航行时被强风吹离了航线。他们遇到了许多怪石崚峋的岛屿，散布在大得多的岛屿的海岸线外——也许那是一个新大陆。\n\n尽管贡比约恩并没有登岸，但这座岛屿似乎是无主的乃至于是无人岛。冰岛的水手们声称要对这个发现做进一步的调查。
更远处还有什么呢？我想知道。

original: The new land discovered to the west of Iceland does indeed seem to be a new island. Under the leadership of Erik the Red, who was banished from Iceland for murder, settlers have claimed land on the island's southwestern shores. To attract more colonists, Erik has cleverly decided on the promising name of Greenland for this untamed, virgin land.\n\nThe new colony has already started exporting walrus ivory, seal blubber and furs to Iceland and beyond. Apart from the brave Norse settlers, Greenland so far seems to be devoid of human life.
translation: 在冰岛西面发现的陆地似乎确实是一座新发现的岛屿。在红胡子埃里克——一个被驱逐出冰岛的杀人犯——的领导下，一群移民们宣布拥有了这座岛屿的西南海岸。为了吸引更多的移民，埃里克做了个明智的决定，那便是以一个充满希望的名字来命名这座未开发岛屿——这便是格陵兰。\n\n格陵兰已经开始向其冰岛及其他地方出口海象象牙、密封鲸油以及毛皮。除了勇敢的维京殖民者外，这座岛上似乎并没有其他人类居住。

original: After hearing stories of new land even further west of Greenland, Leif Eriksson, the son of Erik the Red, has mounted an expedition with a single longship and a crew of thirty-five. Days were spent at sea, but Leif and his crew finally sighted land and traveled south along the coast until they decided to winter at a place he named Vinland. When they returned to Greenland, the brave explorers brought with them a cargo of grapes and some much needed timber.\n\nUpon Leif's return, his brother Thorvald departed on a similar expedition to further map the coastline of this new land, but his shore party came to blows with Skrælings, the local natives, and Thorvald himself fell in battle. Despite this, future expeditions are already being planned to this rich and fertile land.
translation: 在听说在格陵兰的西面的远方还有陆地的传说后，红胡子埃里克的儿子列夫·埃里克松同他手下的三十五名船员登上了一条维京长船。在经过多日的漂泊之后，他们终于发现了陆地并开始沿着海岸南下。他们将这片土地命名为「文兰」并决定在此越冬。当他们回到格陵兰时，带回了一舱葡萄以及必须的木材。\n\n列夫回来后，他的兄弟托尔瓦尔德沿着同样的航线并试图进一步绘制新发现大陆的海岸图。但他的登陆小队遭到了当地土著「着皮者」的袭击，托瓦尔德本人也在战斗中丧生。尽管如此，对这片富饶的土地的征服已纳入了维京人的计划之中。

original: Grave news from beyond the western sea! The explorer Thorfinn Karlsefni sailed towards Vinland with three full longships, intending to establish a permanent settlement in the new world. Sadly, while sailing further south along the coast of Vinland, they came upon a large party of heavily armed Skræling warriors.\n\nThe Skrælings butchered the Norsemen and captured two of the three longships. Thorfinn himself was apparently sacrificed to their vengeful gods, but a few of his men were released so that they could bring warning back to Greenland. According to the survivors, the Skrælings then sailed the captured ships south, towards the cities of their great realm, where our ship-building techniques will be studied by their learned men.
translation: 西海彼岸传来了悲惨的消息！探险家索尔芬·卡尔塞尔芬率领着三艘满载的维京长船试图在文兰这个新大陆建立永久性定居点。不幸的是，当他们沿着文兰海岸驶向南方的时候，遭遇到了一大群全副武装的着皮者战士。\n\n着皮者们对维京移民实施了屠杀并夺取了三艘长船中的两艘。索尔芬本人也在众目睽睽之下被献祭给他们满腔复仇之心的众神，但他们中有几个人成功地逃了出来，并将这个不幸的消息带回到了格陵兰。根据幸存者们的报告，着皮者们驾着他们夺来的船只向南航行到他们强大的王国，也许我们先进的造船技术会被他们学走。

original: I fear we have awoken something dark...
translation: 我想我们惊醒了某些黑暗恐怖的势力……

original: You keep the bear as a pet.
translation: 你留下熊作为你的宠物。

original: The bear is taken outside and shot.
You order your men to release the bear back into the wild.
translation: 你命令你的人将熊放归大自然。

original: You mourn the loss of your bear companion.
translation: 你为你熊伙伴的离去而哀伤。

original: You keep the animal chained for your amusement.
translation: 你将动物用铁链子拴起来作为玩物。

original: You ready your bow and move in towards the trapped animals.
translation: 你将你的弓箭瞄准了落入陷阱里的动物。

original: Preparations for the Great Hunt begin.\n
The assembled forces begin the encirclement.
translation: 聚集起来的部队准备开始包围。

original: You make your way to the area where the forces involved in the hunt are assembling.
translation: 你开始向参与围猎的部队聚集地进发。
捏儿格围猎期间受惩罚

original: In the Nerge, or the Great Hunt, an entire Mongol army hunts all wildlife in a vast expanse of wilderness. This not only provides food for the winter, but also improves discipline among the troops.
translation: 在捏儿格，或者说是大围猎中，蒙古大军会在草原中狩猎所有的猎物，这不仅为他们带来冬天的食物，更提高了部队的纪律。

original: You have sent out the call for the Nerge to your vassals. Preparations for the Great Hunt have begun, and your scouts have chosen a promising region that is rich with game. Mongol warriors are converging on the designated assembly points.
translation: 你开始召唤你的封臣来参与捏儿格围猎。大围猎的准备已经开始，你的侦察兵发现了一片充满猎物的区域，蒙古战士们正在汇聚到指定集合地点。

original: Soon we shall see the mettle of these warriors.
translation: 我们将很快见识到我们战士们的气魄。

original: The call for the Great Hunt goes out.

The great [From.GetTitle] has announced the beginning of the Nerge! This Great Hunt, which will last for several months, is nothing less than a massive training exercise where all arms of the Mongol army come together and are molded into a lethal fighting force. Your presence is required.
translation: 伟大的[From.GetTitle]已宣布捏儿格开始！这场持续数月的大围猎其实是一场规模巨大的军事演习，用以将草原上的蒙古战士聚集在一起训练成一支强大的部队。而你则应参与其中。

original: The preparations for the Nerge have been completed, and your forces are deployed at the assembly points! They will now advance in formation, driving all wildlife before them until they are trapped and surrounded in a large clearing prepared by your scouts. Then the killing begins.
translation: 捏儿格围猎已经准备完毕，你的部队已经部署到了指定会合地点！他们要同别人一起列队前进，驱赶面前的所有野生动物直到它们都被围困在你的斥候预备的巨大空地里。然后，一场盛大的屠戮就开始了。

original: The preparations for the Nerge have been completed, and the [From.GetTitle]'s  forces are deployed at the assembly points! Together, you will now advance in formation, driving all wildlife before you until they are trapped and surrounded in a large clearing prepared by the [From.GetTitle]'s scouts. Then the killing begins.
translation: 捏儿格围猎已经准备完毕，[From.GetTitle]的部队已经部署到了指定会合地点！你要同别人一起列队前进，驱赶面前的所有野生动物直到它们都被围困在[From.GetTitle]的斥候预备的巨大空地里。然后，一场盛大的屠戮就开始了。

original: While guiding the advance in your assigned sector of the Nerge, your horse was suddenly startled by a fox bolting from its hiding place. You were thrown off your saddle, and when you regained consciousness you found your arm painfully twisted at a strange angle. It looks like this hunt is over for you.
translation: 你指挥的部队在捏儿格围猎分配到的片区中列队前进，这时从旁边的草窠里窜出来一只狐狸。你的马惊了，你被甩下了马鞍。当你醒来后你感觉你的胳膊剧痛无比，然后发现它拐成了一个怪异的角度。貌似这场围猎对于你来说已经结束了。

original: While guiding the advance in his assigned sector of the Nerge, [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s horse was suddenly startled by a fox bolting from its hiding place. He was thrown off his saddle and broke his arm. For him, the hunt is over.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]指挥他的部队在捏儿格围猎分配到的片区中列队前进时，这时从旁边的草窠里窜出来一只狐狸。他的马惊了，他从马上甩了下来并把胳膊给摔断了。他的围猎已经结束了。

original: More game for the rest of us.

Your forces continue to drive wildlife before them, but as they pass a small creek, their lines collide with forces under [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s command! The cohesion of your forces has been broken, and when [From.GetFirstName] chastises you in front of your men, you come to blows with the man!
translation: 你的部队在将猎物驱赶向围猎场，但当他们在渡过一条小溪的时候，他们的战线同[From.GetTitledFirstName]的部队撞到了一起！你部队的阵列被彻底打乱了，当[From.GetFirstName]当着你部下的面前指责你的时候，你打了他！

original: Word has reached you that [From.GetTitledFirstName] came to blows with [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] in front of their men, when their advancing lines became entangled in one another. No wildlife seems to have escaped, and the matter has been settled between the men. They will likely hold a grudge, however...
translation: 有消息指[From.GetTitledFirstName]与[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]在他们的人面前互殴，好像是因为他们的部队阵列搅在了一起。幸好没有任何猎物被放跑，而且这也仅仅是两个人之间的冲突。但他们看起来要结仇了……

original: They need to focus on their duties.
translation: 他们必须专注于自己的职责。

original: You have failed to keep the advance of your men orderly, and as a result gaps have opened up in your lines. It's impossible to tell how much wildlife has escaped the encirclement, but some is bound to have slipped through the cracks. When the [Root.Liege.GetTitle] learns of this, [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] will not be pleased...
translation: 你无法让你的属下依照命令行军，你的阵线因此裂开了一个大口子。数不尽的猎物成群结队地从你的阵线的裂口中逃走了。[Root.Liege.GetTitle]要是得知了这个消息，[Root.Liege.GetSheHe]可不会高兴……

original: Through incompetence, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has failed to properly maintain his lines resulting in a large gap forming in the encirclement. Much wildlife has escaped, and tradition dictates that [From.GetFirstName] and his men be punished severely. Failure to do so could disrupt discipline among the other troops.
translation: 无能的[From.GetTitledFirstName]没法维持他部队的阵列并因此造成了一个巨大的缺口。很多猎物从中逃跑了，按照传统[From.GetFirstName]和他的部队将受到严厉的惩罚。不这么做的话，其他部队的纪律将会因此受到影响。

original: The fool will pay for his mistakes.
translation: 那个傻瓜将为他的愚蠢付出代价。

original: I will show leniency this time...

The [Root.Liege.GetTitle], in [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] wisdom, has decided to punish you and your men for your failure to maintain formation. Your life shall be spared, but you will be severely clubbed as a lesson to all. Unit cohesion must be maintained at all times.
translation: 英明的[Root.Liege.GetTitle]决定，鉴于你和你的部队不能再行军中保持阵型，你将受到惩罚。你当然不会有性命之虞，但一顿军棍是逃不了了。保持纪律是军队的天职。

original: Let's get this over with then...
translation: 让我们以此结束这件事吧……

original: As you advance together with your men in the Nerge, you suddenly spot a large and magnificent buck standing in a small clearing. Without thinking you raise your bow and fire an arrow. You score a direct hit and the animal falls to the ground, but you are in trouble now – no animals may be killed at this stage in the hunt.
translation: 你与你的人在捏儿格围猎中推进，你突然看见一头体格巨大的雄鹿站在一小片空地里，你想都没想就拈弓搭箭，朝它射了出去。雄鹿应声倒地，但正因为如此，你遇上大麻烦了，因为在驱赶猎物阶段是不允许射杀任何猎物的。

original: While advancing with his forces, [From.GetTitledFirstName] felled a buck with his bow. This is unacceptable – per ancient tradition, no animals may be killed during the Nerge before the encirclement has been completed. A harsh punishment for this transgression will be expected.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]在率军行进途中射死了一头雄鹿。这是不能容忍的。依照传统，在捏儿格的包围圈彻底完成之前不能射杀任何动物。这种严重违纪行为必须受到惩罚。

original: The horde of frantic animals has been corralled into a clearing and they are now completely surrounded by your forces. As the [Root.GetTitle], you and your closest retinue will be given the first opportunity to engage in the killing sport. Only after you are finished will your vassals be allowed to hunt.
translation: 成群惊恐的猎物被你的部队赶入了指定的区域并被包围了起来，作为[Root.GetTitle]，你和你的侍从们将首先参与进这场围猎之中。只有你的围猎结束后，你的臣属们才有权开始他们的狩猎。

original: The horde of frantic animals has been corralled into a clearing and they are now completely surrounded by the [Root.Liege.GetTitle]'s forces. As is [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] right, the [Root.Liege.GetTitle] and [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] closest retinue will start the killing. When [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] is finished, it will be your turn along with the other vassals.
translation: 成群惊恐的猎物被赶入了指定的区域并被[Root.Liege.GetTitle]的部队包围了起来，以[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]权利，[Root.Liege.GetTitle]及[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]近臣有权首先围猎，当[Root.Liege.GetSheHe]完成狩猎之后，你及其他臣属们才有权开始狩猎。

original: You spend a few hours hunting the trapped game, and it soon becomes obvious to everyone that you have a real knack for this. The arrows from your bow easily find their marks, and you seem better able than most in predicting the behavior of the animals.
translation: 你围猎了几个小时，在这段时间了几乎所有人都见识到了你高超的捕猎技巧。你的弓箭百发百中，你比其他人更了解那些猎物的习性。

original: These furs will warm me in the cold winter months.
translation: 这些毛皮足够在寒冷的冬天用了。

original: One of your warriors has demonstrated exceptional skill during the Nerge, both in sheer martial ability and in the art of effectively commanding a large body of men. He is brought before his [Root.GetTitle], and your advisors suggest that you consider elevating him into a position in your court.
translation: 你的一个战士在捏儿格中展示了他高超的捕猎机巧，不论是个人的武艺还是指挥部队的能力都令人惊叹。他被带到[Root.GetTitle]面前，你的顾问建议将他升任为你的廷臣。

original: No, he belongs with the other soldiers.
translation: 不，他应该和其他战士们在一起。

original: As a gift, one of your warriors participating in the Great Hunt has offered you an exceptional bear cub that he managed to tie up and capturing while advancing with the rest of your forces. The animal's fur is white and its eyes are a deep red – it seems to be an albino.
translation: 大围猎结束后，你手下的一个战士将一只样貌特别的白熊幼崽送给了你。这是他在与其他部队共同推进的时候成功抓住栓起来的。它有着白色的毛皮和红色的眼睛，好像是一只白化种。
快把这个怪物从我眼前拉开！

original: A high-pitched shriek outside your yurt draws your attention. As you push the flaps aside, you spot [From.GetTitledFirstName] lying wounded on the ground not far from your chained pet albino bear. It looks like [From.GetSheHe] got too close to the powerful animal. You return back inside your yurt to focus on more important matters.
translation: 一声尖叫传进了你的宫帐。你推开帘子一看，你的侍臣 [From.GetTitledFirstName]倒在了你的白熊的链子旁边，满身伤痕。看起来[From.GetSheHe]试图靠近这只强壮的动物。于是你回到帐篷里去做一些更重要的事情。
好，我刚才说到哪儿来着……

original: A high-pitched shriek outside your yurt draws your attention. As you push the flaps aside, you spot [From.GetTitledFirstName] lying maimed on the ground not far from your chained pet albino bear. It looks like [From.GetSheHe] got too close to the powerful animal. You return back inside your yurt to focus on more important matters.
translation: 一声尖叫传进了你的宫帐。你推开帘子一看，你的侍臣[From.GetTitledFirstName]倒在了你的白熊的链子旁边，已经残废。看起来[From.GetSheHe]太靠近这只强壮的动物了。于是你回到帐篷里去处理一些更重要的事情。

original: A high-pitched shriek outside your yurt draws your attention. As you push the flaps aside, you spot [From.GetTitledFirstName] lying dead on the ground not far from your chained pet albino bear. It looks like [From.GetSheHe] got too close to the powerful animal. You return back inside your yurt to focus on more important matters.
translation: 一声尖叫传进了你的宫帐。你推开帘子一看，你的侍臣[From.GetTitledFirstName]死在了你的白熊的链子旁边。看起来[From.GetSheHe]太靠近这只强壮的动物了。于是你回到帐篷里去处理一些更重要的事情。

original: Some visiting foreign dignitaries who have come to offer tribute to you, the great [Root.GetTitle], have become very impressed with your pet albino bear. They claim never to have seen such a magnificent beast, and that you must be a powerful leader indeed to have enslaved it.
translation: 一些来向你——伟大的[Root.GetTitle]——进贡的外国贵族为你的宠物白熊而惊叹。他们说自己从未见过如此珍奇的猛兽，而能驯服如此珍兽的您必然是一位强大的君王。

original: Some travelers from faraway Hindustan have offered to teach your pet bear to dance, and you have accepted their offer. After spending many months at your court, they have succeeded and you have become renowned throughout the world as the mighty [Root.GetTitle] with the dancing white bear.
translation: 几个来自远方印度斯坦的旅行家提议要教你的白熊跳舞，你决定接受他们的建议。在你的宫廷了呆了几个月后，他们成功了。如今你拥有会跳舞白熊的威武的[Root.GetTitle]之名已然传遍世界。
我……对于跳舞我根本把持不住……

original: Your pet albino bear does not seem to be feeling well. It refuses to eat, and its handlers are at a loss to explain what might be wrong with it. Could it be that the proud animal has grown tired of its chains and yearns to be free?
translation: 你的宠物白熊看起来似乎不舒服。它根本不吃东西，它的饲养员也不知道这到底是为什么。难道说这只高傲的动物已然厌倦了束缚而开始渴望自由了吗？

original: Release the bear back into the wilds.
Sadly, you discovered this morning that your pet albino bear has passed away. The poor animal will get a proper funeral.
translation: 悲剧，今天早上你发现你的宠物白熊已经死了。你决定厚葬这只可怜的动物。

original: As per tradition, some of your older soldiers have come before you to plead for the life of those few animals that remain in the encircled clearing. Their release, as a display of the [Root.GetTitle]'s mercy, usually signals the end of the Nerge, and the beginning of nine days of feasting.
translation: 依照传统，几个老战士来到了你的帐前，请求放掉包围圈中少数几只剩余动物以显示[Root.GetTitle]的仁慈。这通常也是捏儿格结束的标志，同时意味着一场长达九天的盛大宴会的开始。

original: Yes. As is tradition, these animals shall not be harmed.
translation: 是。依照传统，将放剩下的这些动物一条生路。

original: No, kill them all! No survivors!
translation: 不，一只也不留，统统杀光！

original: With the hunt over and the fallen game collected, a magnificent feast has been prepared for all who took part. The next nine days will be ones of drunken revelry and celebration.
translation: 围猎结束之后，一场盛大宴会已经准备完毕，所有参与围猎之人都能参加。接下来的九天是痛饮狂欢的九天。

original: Let us drink and be merry!

With the feasting over, the remaining spoils of the hunt are divided evenly between all of the forces that participated. As everyone departs, you survey the surrounding land. It will be some time before the wildlife in this region recovers from this slaughter, but when that happens, the time will be ripe for another Great Hunt.
translation: 宴会结束后，狩猎的成果将由所有参与围猎的战士们均分。当所有的部队都离开后，你望着着这片猎场。看来这里的野生动物从这次屠戮中恢复可能需要一段时间了。但当那一天来临之际，一场新的大围猎就要开始了。

original: May it go as well as this one did.
translation: 下次我们会像这次做的一样好。

original: With the present war, the Great Hunt has been called off and you and your men will have to get your training hunting the most dangerous game of all – Man. Perhaps when the dust has settled and peace returned, a new Nerge can be organized.
translation: 因为正在发生的战争，大围猎取消了，而你和你的战士们将会通过围猎一些更加危险的猎物来训练你们的狩猎技巧，那猎物就是人。也许当硝烟散尽，和平回归之时，我们可以组织一场新的捏儿格。

original: A different breed of hunt, but a hunt all the same.
translation: 虽然是不同种类的狩猎，但本质上都是一样的。

original: Hold a great blot together with your vassals and offer sacrifice to the gods for good harvests and success on the battlefield. This can only be done every ninth year.
translation: 和你的臣属一同举办一场大祭典，为神灵先上牺牲，祈求风调雨顺、五谷丰登、所向披靡、战无不胜。每九年才能举办这样一次祭典。

original: You begin preparations for the blot.\n

translation: 倒吊之神奥丁已经准备好了他的绳子。

original: Vassal opinion increases by §G+15§! for §Y12§! months.\nYou move inside the large feast hall...
translation: 封臣的好感度增加了 §G+15§! 持续 §Y12§! 个月。\n你来到了宴会大厅。

original: You watch as the dancing flames rise towards the sky.
It looks like spring shall come this year.
translation: 似乎春天今年也会来临。

original: You have sent out summons to all of your vassals for the blot. Those that have been baptized or profess to follow the teachings of the Prophet will have to offer gold to be exempted from this magnificent feast.
translation: 你发出召唤，命令你的所有封臣前来参加祭典。那些洗礼过的人或是宣信追随先知教导的人必须交纳贡金才能免于参加这场盛宴。

original: Your wise liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has summoned you and [From.GetHerHis] other vassals to a blot. There you will worship and give sacrifice to the gods before taking part in a great feast where you drink to their name.
translation: 你英明的领主[From.GetTitledFirstName]召唤你及[From.GetHerHis]其他封臣参与祭典。你将祭拜神灵并为之献上祭品，之后你将参加一场盛宴并以神之圣名痛饮。
我可不想误了这等好事。

original: Your liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], remains trapped in [From.GetHerHis] heathen ways, and now [From.GetSheHe] has summoned all of [From.GetHerHis] vassals to a blot where [From.GetSheHe] intends to give sacrifice to [From.GetHerHis] pagan gods. Since you do not practise their heathen religion, you will be expected to contribute gold in order to be exempted from this ceremony.
translation: 你的领主[From.GetTitledFirstName]沉湎于[From.GetHerHis]错误的信仰中不能自拔，现在[From.GetSheHe]召唤[From.GetHerHis]所有的封臣，[From.GetSheHe]打算向[From.GetHerHis]原始宗教邪神献祭。既然你不奉行他们的异教，你将为此支付贡金来免除参与他们的祭典。

original: I suppose I have no choice in the matter.
As [This.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] is my witness, I shan't pay!
translation: [This.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]在上，我不会为异端邪神付钱！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName], your vassal, is stubborn in [From.GetHerHis] ways and speaks only of the mercy of [From.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap], but [From.GetSheHe] has wisely decided to offer you some gold to be exempted from the blot.
translation: 你的封臣[From.GetTitledFirstName]顽固地宣扬[From.GetHeShe]所信仰之神[From.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]的慈悲，但[From.GetSheHe]很明智地决定向你提供一笔贡金来免除参与祭典的义务。

original: Your refusal to pay is received.
translation: 你的领主得知你不愿支付贡金。

original: Despite having sworn you fealty, [From.GetTitledFirstName] refuses to offer gold in order to be exempted from the blot! According to [From.GetFirstName], [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName] would not forgive [From.GetHerHim] if [From.GetSheHe] contributed as much as a single copper to a heathen festival.
translation: 尽管宣示他的忠诚，[From.GetTitledFirstName]还是拒绝为免除他参与祭典的义务而支付贡金！[From.GetFirstName]声称，如果[From.GetSheHe]为异教节日献上那怕一枚铜板的贡金，[From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]都不会饶恕[From.GetHerHim]罪行。

original: This insult will not be forgotten.
translation: 我不会忘记如此之亵渎。

original: The guests have arrived, and the time has come for the blot to begin! You gather outside the temple, and start by offering animals as sacrifice to the gods. While their meat is prepared for the feast that is to follow, the blood is sprinkled on statues of Odin, Thor, Freyr and the other gods, as well as on the worshipers themselves.
translation: 客人们已经到了，你们聚集在圣殿之外，献上动物以为神之牺牲。它们的血将浇在奥丁，索尔，弗雷尔以及其他众神的神像之上，以及献祭众人自己的身上。 那些动物的肉则会成为之后宴会的食材。

original: The time has come for the blot held by [From.GetTitledFirstName] to begin! You gather outside the temple, and start by offering animals as sacrifice to the gods. While their meat is prepared for the feast that is to follow, the blood is sprinkled on statues of Odin, Thor, Freyr and the other gods, as well as on the worshipers themselves.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]主持的祭典开始啦！你们聚集在圣殿之外，献上动物以为神之牺牲。它们的血将浇在奥丁，索尔，弗雷尔以及其他众神的神像之上，以及献祭众人自己的身上。那些动物的肉则会成为之后宴会的食材。

original: Although you have been told little, the noise from outside your dungeon is enough to make it clear that your captor, [Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName] is holding a blot where [Root.Host.GetSheHe] will offer sacrifice in worship of [Root.Host.GetHerHis] gods. Guards burst inside your cell and drag you away to the gallows outside the local temple...
translation: 虽然你之前听到了一点风声，但地牢外的嘈杂声告诉你，抓到你的[Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName]，[Root.Host.GetSheHe]正在举办一场祭典并准备为[Root.Host.GetHerHis]信仰之神献上牺牲。卫兵突然冲进了你的牢房并把你拖到了大庙外的绞架上……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is brought up from your dungeons and escorted to the temple. A noose is placed around [From.GetHerHis] neck and the rope is thrown over a sturdy branch of a nearby oak. A small yellow pool forms at [From.GetFirstName]'s feet.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]已经从你的地牢里押往圣殿。绞索已经套到了[From.GetHerHis]脖子上，绳子则已经摆到了附近的一颗结实的橡树的旁边。此时[From.GetFirstName]脚下出现一个黄色的小水泡（尿了）。

original: Allfather, we offer you this sacrifice...
translation: 万物之主，我们在此为您献上牺牲……

original: No, I have changed my mind.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is brought up from your dungeons and escorted to the temple. As the noose is placed around [From.GetHerHis] neck, [From.GetSheHe] steadies [From.GetHerselfHimself] and murmurs several passages that you recognize as being from the Christian holy book.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]已经从你的地牢里押往圣殿。绞索已经套到了[From.GetHerHis]脖子上，[From.GetSheHe]控制住了[From.GetHerselfHimself]，并默念几句话，你知道那是几句他们基督徒圣经中的篇章。

original: Where is your Blessed Virgin now, [From.GetFirstName]?
translation: 现在你那万福童贞玛利亚在哪呢，[From.GetFirstName]？

original: No, perhaps this is a bad idea...
translation: 哦，这也许不是个好主意……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is brought up from your dungeons and escorted to the temple. Your guards place the noose around [From.GetHerHis] neck while [From.GetSheHe] murmurs a passage with closed eyes from the Mohammedan holy book.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]已经从你的地牢里押往圣殿。你的卫兵已经绞索已经套到了[From.GetHerHis]脖子上，这时[From.GetSheHe]闭眼默念了几句伊斯兰教经书中的篇章。

original: Soon you shall meet your Prophet, friend.
translation: 兄弟，你马上就要去见你的先知啦。

original: No, perhaps this is a bad idea...
translation: 哦，这也许不是个好主意……

original: Your brother, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is brought up from his dungeon and escorted to the temple. As the noose is placed around his neck, he looks at you with pleading eyes. Don't do this, [Root.GetFirstName]. There has to be some other way...
translation: 你的兄弟[From.GetTitledFirstName]已经从他的地牢里押往圣殿。绞索已经套到了他的脖子上，他以乞求的眼光看着你。别这么做，[Root.GetFirstName]，也许我们还有其他的方法可以来商量……

original: I'm afraid not. Do it, men.
translation: 恐怕不行，该怎么办怎么办。

original: No, I can't do this to my own brother...
translation: 不，我不能这么对待我的亲兄弟……

original: Your sister, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is dragged up from her dungeon and escorted to the temple. She looks up at you with tears streaming down her face as your guards place the noose around her neck. Please, [Root.GetFirstName], she says with a trembling voice. Don't let them do this.
translation: 你的姐妹[From.GetTitledFirstName]，已经从她的地牢里押往圣殿的绞架。她看着你，泪流满面，你的卫兵将绞索套在了她的脖子上。求你了，[Root.GetFirstName]，她以瑟瑟发抖的声音对你说。别让他们这么做。

original: There can be no turning back now. I'm sorry.
translation: 现在无法回头了。对不起。

original: The guards drag your father, [From.GetTitledFirstName], from his dungeon and escort him to the temple where they place the noose around his neck. My [Root.GetSonDaughter], he croaks while looking at you. Can't you find it in your heart to forgive me?
translation: 卫兵将你的父亲，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，从他的地牢里押往圣殿并将绞索套到了他的脖子上。我的[Root.GetSonDaughter]，他用他那苍老的声音对你说。你问问你的良心，难道不能放了我吗？

original: I can't do this to my own father...
translation: 我不能这么对待我的父亲……

original: Distant screaming can be heard as your guards drag your mother, [From.GetTitledFirstName], from her dungeon. They bring her to the temple and as they place the noose around her neck, she looks at you with pleading eyes. W-why would you do this to your own mother?
translation: 尖叫声从远方传来，你的卫兵将你的母亲[From.GetTitledFirstName]从地牢里押解过来。他们将她押往圣殿并将绞索套在了她的脖子上。她用乞求的眼光望着你。你怎么会这样对待你的亲妈？

original: The guards fetch your son, [From.GetTitledFirstName], from his dungeon and lead him to the temple. There a noose is placed around his neck and the rope is thrown over a sturdy branch of a nearby oak. Before your men pull at the rope, your son looks at you with tearful eyes. Please don't, [Root.GetFatherMother]... please don't.
translation: 卫兵抓来了你的儿子，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，并把他押往圣殿。绞索已经套到了他的脖子上，绳子已经在一棵结实的橡木旁边摆好了。在你的手下拉紧绳子之前，你的儿子用他的一双泪眼看着你。别这么做，[Root.GetFatherMother]……别这么做。

original: I can't do this... not to my own boy...
translation: 我不能这么对待……我的儿子……

original: Your daughter, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is pulled from her dungeon and brought to the temple by your guards. As they place the noose around her neck, she looks at you with a desperate yet piercing glare. Is this really what you have been reduced to, [Root.GetFatherMother]? To do this... against your own daughter?
translation: 你的女儿，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，被你的卫兵从地牢押往神庙。绞索已经套到了她的脖子上，她用绝望而愤怒的眼光望着你。这就是你想得到的吗，[Root.GetFatherMother]？这样……对你的亲生女儿？

original: You have left me with little choice.
No, send her back... not to my girl...
translation: 不……把她带回去，我不能这么对待我的女儿……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is brought from your dungeons by the guards and placed at the gallows in front of the temple. As they place the noose around [From.GetHerHis] neck, [From.GetFirstName] cries out to you. Don't do this, [Root.GetFirstName]! We are family and of the same blood!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]已经被卫兵从地牢押往绞刑架。绞索已经套到了[From.GetHerHis]脖子上，[From.GetFirstName]对你哭喊道：别这么做，[Root.GetFirstName]！我们是一家人啊，我们身体里流着同样的血！

original: Yes, and that only proves my devotion to Odin.
translation: 是啊，这正展现了我对奥丁的虔诚。

original: Your spouse, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is dragged to the gallows in front of the temple and your guards place the noose around [From.GetHerHis] neck. In a last desperate effort to save  [From.GetHerselfHimself], [From.GetFirstName] calls out to you for mercy. I have always loved you, [Root.GetFirstName]... and I always will.
translation: 你的配偶[From.GetTitledFirstName]，已经被卫兵从地牢押往圣殿，绞索已经套到[From.GetHerHis]脖子上。为了抓住生命中最后的一根稻草救[From.GetHerselfHimself]，[From.GetFirstName]大喊乞求你的宽恕：我之前一直爱着你，[Root.GetFirstName]……我以后也永远爱你。

original: Forgive me then, my love, but this is how it must be.
translation: 那就原谅我，我的爱，但我必须这么做。

original: No, this is too much... I can't permit it.

From deep within your dungeons, your guards bring out [From.GetTitledFirstName], your Skræling prisoner. As they drag [From.GetHerHim] to the front of the temple and place the noose around [From.GetHerHis] neck, the Skræling shouts something in [From.GetHerHis] own language and stares at you defiantly.
translation: 你的卫兵从你的地牢里拖来了[From.GetTitledFirstName]，你的「着皮者」俘虏。[From.GetHerHim]被押往圣殿绞索已经套到了[From.GetHerHis]脖子上，着皮者用[From.GetHerHis]语言大叫并以敌视的眼光瞪着你。

original: Let us show you how a proper human sacrifice is done.
translation: 给你看看什么叫人祭的正确做法。

original: No, this brave Skræling shall live to see another day.
translation: 不，这个勇敢的着皮者应该活下来。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] is dragged to the great oak in front of the temple and a noose is placed around [FromFrom.GetHerHis] neck. Soon [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s body dangles limply in the cold breeze from one of the tree branches.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]被拖到了圣殿外巨大的橡树旁，绞索已然套到了[FromFrom.GetHerHis]脖子上。很快 [FromFrom.GetFirstName]的身体就挂在橡树的枝桠上随着寒风风摇摆。
