original: Your chances of winning are great.
Your chances of winning are very good.
translation: 你有很不错的机会获胜。

original: Your chances of winning are good.
Your chances of winning are poor.
Your chances of winning are very poor.
translation: 你获胜的机会非常渺茫。

original: Your chances of winning are awful.
translation: 国足赢了世界杯你才可能获胜。

original: You refrain from issuing the challenge.
translation: 你克制住了决斗的冲动。

original: You prepare yourself for the upcoming holmgang.
translation: 你为即将到来的小岛决斗做准备。

original: His Holiness, [Root.GetTitledFirstName], has been swayed by the cries for help from the Christian population in the [From.GetFullName]. He urges all able-bodied men of Europe to take up arms against the evil [New.GetTitledName] in order to secure [From.GetName] from the clutches of the Mahommedan infidels.\n\n God will grant the pilgrims remission of sins in Heaven!
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]陛下被[From.GetFullName]的基督徒的恸哭打动了。他号召全欧洲的健壮青年拿起武器去对抗邪恶的[New.GetTitledName]，旨在从伊斯兰异教徒的手中拯救[From.GetName]。\n\n上帝将在天堂宽恕朝圣者的罪！

original: His Holiness, [Root.GetTitledFirstName], is worried about the state of the souls in the [From.GetFullBaseName]. The heathens under [New.GetTitledName] have no hope for salvation and will suffer the eternal fires unless they can be brought to Christ in this life. Any Christian so willing is offered complete absolution of sins in the armed mission against the [New.Religion.GetName] barbarians!
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]陛下担忧[From.GetFullBaseName]里灵魂们的状态。[New.GetTitledName]的异教徒毫无救赎的希望，除非他们今生能信仰基督，否则将遭到永火的灼烧。所有基督徒在对抗[New.Religion.GetName]野蛮人的武装传教中都将获得完全免除罪孽的奖赏！

original: The [From.GetFullBaseName] is afflicted with the scourge of Heresy. His Holiness, [Root.GetTitledFirstName], has decided that the impure [New.GetTitledName] and [New.GetPossPronoun] fallen followers must be Cleansed before this black stain spreads any further!
translation: [From.GetFullBaseName]正遭到异端的荼毒。[Root.GetTitledFirstName]陛下认为肮脏的[New.GetTitledName]和[New.GetPossPronoun]堕落的追随者们必须被净化，吾辈须赶在这些黑暗的蚀迹扩散之前！

original: The great [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to call a Jihad against the Kafirs in the [From.GetFullBaseName]. He urges all righteous [Root.Religion.GetName] Muslims to take up arms against the depraved [New.GetTitledName] for the glory of Islam.\n\n Allah is merciful!
translation: 伟大的[Root.Religion.GetName][Root.GetTitledFirstName]决定在[From.GetFullBaseName]发起一场对抗异教徒的吉哈德。他号召所有正义的[Root.Religion.GetName]穆斯林为了伊斯兰拿起武器反抗堕落的[New.GetTitledName]。\n\n仁慈的安拉！

original: The [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to declare Jihad on the depraved heathens in the [From.GetFullBaseName]. He urges all righteous [Root.Religion.GetName] Muslims to partake in the righteous struggle against [New.GetTitledName] for the glory of Islam.\n\n Allah is great!
translation: [Root.Religion.GetName][Root.GetTitledFirstName]决定在[From.GetFullBaseName]发起对抗异教的吉哈德。他号召所有正义的[Root.Religion.GetName]穆斯林为了伊斯兰拿起武器反抗堕落的[New.GetTitledName]。\n\n伟大的安拉！

original: The most righteous [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.GetTitledFirstName] is deeply concerned with the straying people of the [From.GetFullBaseName], many of whom barely deserve being called Muslims. He urges all true ([Root.Religion.GetName]) Muslims to aid in the struggle against the heretic [New.GetTitledName] for the glory of Islam.\n\n Allah is merciful!
translation: 至正的[Root.Religion.GetName][Root.GetTitledFirstName]深深地担心[From.GetFullBaseName]迷失信仰的人们，他们中的多数都难以称之为穆斯林。他号召所有真正的（[Root.Religion.GetName]）穆斯林为了伊斯兰的荣光拿起武器反抗异端[New.GetTitledName]。\n\n仁慈的安拉！

original: The mighty [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has decided that it is time to teach [New.GetTitledName] and the believers in the dead crucified god another lesson in humility. All free [Root.Religion.GetName] men are invited to partake in the scouring of the [From.GetFullBaseName]!\n\n [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] is with us!
translation: 伟大的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]认为是时候教教[New.GetTitledName]以及那些信仰钉死在十字架上的神的信徒什么是谦虚。所有自由的[Root.Religion.GetName]都被邀请加入洗劫[From.GetFullBaseName]！\n\n[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]与我们同在！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has had a vision from [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], ordering [Root.GetObjectPronoun] to declare a great [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] on [New.GetTitledName] and the cawing followers of the mad Arab. All free [Root.Religion.GetName] men are invited to feast in their holy places!\n\n [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] is mighty!
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]受到来自[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的神视，命令[Root.GetObjectPronoun]对[New.GetTitledName]和那个疯阿拉伯人叽喳乱叫的追随者们发动伟大的[Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName]。所有自由的[Root.Religion.GetName]人都被邀请到在他们圣地举办的盛宴中！\n\n[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]大能！

original: The omens are clear - [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has declared [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] on [New.GetTitledName] and the followers of [New.Religion.GetRandomGodName] in the [From.GetFullBaseName]! All free [Root.Religion.GetName] men are encouraged to aid in the conquest of their holy places!\n\n [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] will strike down their '[New.Religion.GetRandomGodName]'!
translation: 清晰的预兆——[Root.GetTitledFirstName]对[New.GetTitledName]和[From.GetFullBaseName]内[New.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的追随者们发动[Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName]！所有自由的[Root.Religion.GetName]人都被鼓励在对他们圣地的征服中提供帮助！\n\n [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]将击败他们的[New.Religion.GetRandomGodName]！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName], a preacher in the service of [From.Liege.GetTitledName], has arrived in [From.Location.GetName] to spread the gospel of their foreign religion. He has little regard for our old faith, declaring it sinful, and he has explained in detail the horrors we shall suffer in the afterlife unless we mend our ways.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]，一个服侍[From.Liege.GetTitledName]的传教士，来到了[From.Location.GetName]传播他们的外国宗教。他毫不尊重我们的信仰，并宣称其罪孽深重，他还解释道除非我们改变信仰否则死后会遭受无穷的苦难。

original: There are horrors to suffer in this life as well, friend...
translation: 今生也是会遭受苦难的，我的朋友……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has continued preaching his religion in [From.Location.GetName], and he seems to be gathering a larger and larger audience. After listening to one of his sermons, you have to admit that the new faith may have some advantages...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]继续在[From.Location.GetName]传教，他似乎拥有一大批簇拥者。在听完他布道后，你不得不承认这个新信仰有一些优点……

original: The time has come to embrace [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName].
No, the old ways are best! Banish the preacher!
translation: 不，现在的信仰是最好的！驱逐这个传教士！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has fallen under the sway of [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] and the religion he preaches. After listening to the [FromFrom.GetTitle]'s sermons, [From.GetFirstName] has completely abandoned the old ways, and now only offers prayers to [FromFrom.Religion.GetRandomGodName].
translation: 因为[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]的布道，[From.GetTitledFirstName]的信仰动摇了。听完[FromFrom.GetTitle]的布道后，[From.GetFirstName]彻底抛弃了旧信仰，现在只为[FromFrom.Religion.GetRandomGodName]祈祷。

original: The poison that preacher spreads ends here!
translation: 那个传教士不能再继续荼毒这里了！

original: You come upon [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] wrestling like children on the ground and screaming obscenities at each another. It would seem the two preachers have had a difference of opinion. As soon as they see you, they stop what they're doing and both immediately demand the expulsion of the other.
translation: 你看到[From.GetTitledFirstName]和[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]像孩子一样互相叫骂着在地上打滚。看来这两个传教士有点分歧。看到你来了，他们停了下来并要求把对方驱逐。

original: I refuse to have any part in this petty quarrel.
translation: 我不想卷入这场小矛盾。

original:
My liege, I have arrived safely in [From.Location.GetName] and the local ruler has given me permission to remain here and spread the true faith. May [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName] grant me the strength to endure the heathen ways of these savages...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，我安全抵达了[From.Location.GetName]，当地的统治者允许我留下来传播真正的信仰。愿[From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]赐予我力量来感化这些野蛮人……

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Soon after [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] arrived in [FromFrom.Location.GetName], [From.GetTitledFirstName] ordered his imprisonment. Your [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] is now languishing in the dungeons of this pagan lord. Who can tell what the savages will do to him?
translation: 不久后[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]到达[FromFrom.Location.GetName]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]下令监禁他。你的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]在异教徒的手中日渐憔悴。谁知道这些野蛮人会对他做什么？

original:
My liege, I bring good news! Thanks to my efforts, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has seen the light and converted to the true faith. I shall return to your court forthwith, as my work here is done.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，我带来了好消息！通过我的努力，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]找到了正确的信仰。我的工作已经完成了，我将马上回到您的宫廷。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]
又一个异教徒改邪归正了。

original:
My liege, I bring bad news. Although I seemed to be making progress in encouraging [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] to abandon [From.GetHerHis] heathen ways, [FromFrom.GetSheHe] had a sudden change of heart. I have been banished from [FromFrom.Location.GetName], and I say good riddance! Let these stubborn savages suffer the eternal horror that await them in the afterlife!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，有个坏消息。虽然我努力使[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]抛弃[From.GetHerHis]异端信仰，但 [FromFrom.GetSheHe]突然改变了心意。我被[FromFrom.Location.GetName]驱逐了，能摆脱他太好了！让这些冥顽不化的野蛮人死后遭受无穷的痛楚吧！

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: You have received word that [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been imprisoned by [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]. It seems the [FromFrom.GetTitle] took offense when your [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] converted one of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] courtiers away from heathenry.
translation: 你收到消息说[From.GetTitledFirstName]被[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]囚禁了。看起来[FromFrom.GetTitle]觉得受到了冒犯，因为你的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]在转化[FromFrom.GetHerHis]异教徒廷臣。
那个傻瓜应该充满感激！

original:
My liege, that vile savage [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has banished me from [FromFrom.GetHerHis] lands! I got into a minor... dispute with a preacher who was there to spread his faith at the behest of another lord, and [FromFrom.GetFirstName] foolishly took his side.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，那个卑鄙的野蛮人[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]把我从[FromFrom.GetHerHis]土地驱逐了！我和传播别的信仰的传教士发生了点小争吵，[FromFrom.GetFirstName]愚蠢地站在他那边。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: You throw the preacher into your dungeons.
translation: 你把这个传教士关进了地牢。

original: You allow the preacher to continue his missionary work.
translation: 你允许这个传教士继续传教。

original: You banish the preacher from your lands.
translation: 你把这个传教士从你的领地驱逐了。

original: You and your closest family convert to the new faith, and a new religious advisor appears at your court.
translation: 你和你最亲密的家人转变了信仰，一个新的宗教顾问来到了你的宫廷。

original: You have arrived at [Root.Location.GetName] to convert the local populace to the true faith.
translation: 你来到了[Root.Location.GetName]给民众带来真正的信仰。

original: Embrace [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] before it is too late, heathens!
You have seen the local pagan lord paying special attention to your sermons lately. Could a conversion be at hand?
translation: 你发现最近当地的异教徒首脑对你的布道格外关注。他是要改宗了吗？

original: Let us pray it is so...

Through your efforts, you have managed to convert one of the local pagan lord's courtiers to the true faith. Surely this is an important stepping stone on the way to salvation for all of [Root.Location.GetName]!
translation: 通过你的努力，当地异教徒首脑的廷臣们已经改信了真正的信仰。这是拯救所有[Root.Location.GetName]重要的一步！

original: You come to blows with another cleric who has also come to [Root.Location.GetName] to convert the people to his own faith!
translation: 你跟另一个到[Root.Location.GetName]传播他的信仰的神职人员打了起来！

original: Ever since the Sassanid Empire succumbed to the Arab invasions, Persia has suffered under the yoke of Mohammedan rulers. The last remnants of the old Zoroastrian order retreated north into the plains of Central Asia, but now, at long last, Zoroastrian rule over Persia has been restored.\n\nThis miraculous recovery can be attributed to your brilliant leadership, and there are many amongst the clergy who have decreed you to be the Saoshyant – the savior of the world that Zoroaster himself spoke of thousands of years ago. After embracing this role, you are now revered as a holy icon by Zoroastrians everywhere.
translation: 自从萨珊帝国在阿拉伯的入侵灭亡后，波斯被穆斯林统治者戴上了镣铐。残余的祆教信徒撤退到了中亚的平原，但现在祆教的统治者终于夺回了波斯。\n\n这个奇迹归功于你明智的领导，许多神职人员声称你是萨奥希扬特——祆教传说中的救世主。认可了这一身份后，你在祆教各处都备受崇敬。

original: I shall bring benefit to all.
This character is the Saoshyant, the promised savior of the world and a holy icon according to the Zoroastrian belief.
translation: 这个角色是萨奥希扬特，世界的救世主和祆教的崇高象征。

original: This character is a descendant of the Saoshyant, who was the savior of the world according to the Zoroastrian belief.
translation: 这个角色是萨奥希扬特，祆教救世主的后裔。

original: If you can drive out the Muslims and restore Zoroastrian rule over the entirety of the Persian Empire, you may declare yourself to be Zoroaster's prophesied Saoshyant – the chosen savior of the world.
translation: 如果你能驱逐穆斯林并恢复祆教对整个波斯帝国的统治，你就可以宣布你是预言中的萨奥斯亚特，这个世界的救世主。

original: Persia has been a bastion of Islam ever since the Sassanid Empire fell to the Arab invasions of the 7th century, but now, in what can only be described as a miraculous recovery, the land has been united under Zoroastrian rule once more. Under the leadership of [From.GetTitledFirstName], the Muslim overlords of Persia have been killed, driven out or converted to the Zoroastrian faith.\n\nZoroastrians everywhere now hail [From.GetFirstName] as the "Saoshyant," the divine savior who delivered them from the darkness as prophesied by Zoroaster himself thousands of years ago. Is this the beginning of a new Zoroastrian golden age, or is it, as some believe, a sign of the End Time?
translation: 自从萨珊帝国在七世纪亡于阿拉伯入侵后，波斯就成了伊斯兰的大本营，但现在的复国只能被解释为奇迹，这片土地再次统一在祆教的统治之下。在[From.GetTitledFirstName]的领导下，波斯的穆斯林大领主们要么被杀，要么被驱逐，要么改宗为祆教信仰。\n\n祆教的信徒们现在称[From.GetFirstName]为萨奥希扬特，几千年前琐罗亚斯德本人预言会拯救他们脱离黑暗的神圣救主。这是祆教新黄金时代的开始吗，还是如某些人所相信的，是末日的征兆？

original: We must rid Persia of infidels again!
translation: 必须把波斯再次从异教徒手中拯救出来！

original: If the Zoroastrian faith makes a return as the state religion of Persia, the time will be ripe for the reinstitution of the office of the Priest of Priests: the Moabadan-Moabad.
translation: 如果祆教重新成为波斯国教，那么时机就到了：重新设立众祭司的祭司，穆贝旦—穆贝德这一职位。

original: After an interlude lasting a few centuries following the Arab conquests, Zoroastrianism has returned as the state religion of Persia. [From.GetTitledFirstName] has ordered the reinstitution of the office of the Moabadan-Moabad, or the "Priest of Priests."\n\nThe Moabadan-Moabad will serve as the highest religious authority in the Zoroastrian world, with powers ranging from the blessing of future military expeditions to the granting of divorces to married couples.
translation: 在阿拉伯人持续上百年的征服之后，祆教在此重新成为国教，[From.GetTitledFirstName]下令再度设立穆贝旦—穆贝德，即众祭司的祭司这一职位。\n\n穆贝旦—穆贝德是祆教的最高权威，权力大到保佑未来的军事远征，小到许可离婚。

original: By tradition, the title of Yagbu is bestowed upon the second highest member of a ruling clan, often a brother of the Khan. It carries a great deal of respect.
translation: 按照传统，叶护头衔赐予统治家族的第二号人物，一般是汗王的兄弟。这将带来很高的荣誉。

original: Ishad is the title given to the highest ranking generals, and as such, it may be regarded as a mark of honor.
translation: 汗伯克是给予最高等级将军的头衔，有着很高的荣誉。

original: The Kündur is traditionally a high ranking official in the Khan's court, and bestowing it on someone is a sign of approval.
translation: 传统上昆杜尔是汗王的宫廷中高级的政府官员，将其授予某人意味他获得了赞许。

original: After a brutal civil war, the decadent dynasty of my former liege has finally been overthrown by the [Root.Liege.GetOnlyDynastyName] clan. In the transitional chaos, I could probably get away with a declaration of independence...
translation: 残酷的内战之后，我的上一名领主因王朝衰微最终被[Root.Liege.GetOnlyDynastyName]部族推翻。在过渡时期的混乱中，我或许可以趁机宣告独立…

original: After a successful siege, your men drag §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! out of [From.GetHerHis] hiding hole.
translation: 破城后，你的部队把§Y[From.GetTitledName]§!从[From.GetHerHis]藏身洞中抓了出来。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is brought up from your dungeons and escorted to the temple. When [From.GetSheHe] sees the dangling noose about to be placed around [From.GetHerHis] neck, [From.GetSheHe] pushes the nearest guard aside and makes a desperate run for it, but to no avail. Your men drag [From.GetHerHim] kicking and screaming back to the temple.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]从你的地牢中带了出来并护送到神殿。当[From.GetSheHe]看到[From.GetHerHis]脖子周围晃来晃去的绞索，[From.GetSheHe]推开最近的守卫想逃跑但是失败了。你的人拖着尖叫的[From.GetHerHim]回到了神殿。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is brought up from your dungeons and escorted to the temple. Even as the noose is placed around [From.GetHerHis] neck, [From.GetFirstName] stares vacantly ahead without betraying any emotion whatsoever. It would seem [From.GetSheHe] has accepted [From.GetHerHis] fate.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]从你的地牢中带了出来并护送到神殿。即使[From.GetHerHis]脖子周围放着锁链，[From.GetFirstName]也是呆呆的看着神情木然。看来[From.GetSheHe]接受了[From.GetHerHis]命运。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is brought up from your dungeons and escorted to the temple. As soon as [From.GetSheHe] spots you among those gathered nearby, [From.GetSheHe] hurls insults and spittle your way, continuing even as the noose is placed around [From.GetHerHis] neck. The hatred in [From.GetHerHis] eyes cannot be mistaken.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]从你的地牢中带了出来并护送到神殿。[From.GetSheHe]一认出你来，[From.GetSheHe]就朝你辱骂吐口水，也不顾[From.GetHerHis]脖子上还带着锁链。[From.GetHerHis]眼睛里充满了仇恨。

original: As your men return from looting the holding, one of them hands you an axe with a strange purple sheen and a plus etched into the handle, followed by the number two. After weighing it carefully in your hands, you toss aside your old, grey axe in favor of the new weapon.
translation: 你的人劫掠战利品归来，有柄斧头闪耀着奇异的紫色光辉，在手柄上蚀刻着「+」和「2」这两个奇怪的符文。你仔细掂量了一下，换掉了你的灰色的旧斧。

original: Through my sources I have learned that our mutual problem will be touring a city in an open carriage. The guards will keep a close watch on the streets, but will they expect bowmen on the rooftops?
translation: 根据我的情报，我了解到我们的那个小麻烦要在一辆敞篷马车里游览城市。卫兵们会紧盯着街道两旁，但他们怎么会料来自屋顶上的弓箭呢？

original: Watching the animal pens outside [Root.Location.GetName] gave me an idea. Concentrated manure can be a very explosive substance, and if enough is gathered in a single place and ignited, the blast could prove lethal...
translation: 望着[Root.Location.GetName]外的家畜棚，我有了个主意。集中在一起的粪便可是极易爆炸的，如果在同一个地点收集足量并点燃，爆炸将会是致命的……

original: If that whelp we are plotting against is to die, we will need to buy the loyalty of someone unscrupulous nearby, like a maid or a guard.
translation: 如果我们计划密谋杀死那个小崽子，就应该先收买某个无耻的近侍，比如侍女或者卫兵。

original: The fact that the target of our plot is in prison can work to our advantage. If we could get someone on the inside to deal with our little problem and make it look like a failed escape attempt...
translation: 如果我们密谋对付的人被囚禁了，我们可以收买牢里的人处理问题，让这看起来像一次失败的越狱…

original: The target of our plot may be a drooling, incapable mess, but it is still a very much alive drooling, incapable mess. Every month servants give our little problem a sorely needed bath, during which so many things could go wrong... especially if those servants were in our employ.
translation: 就算我们密谋对付的人是个只会流口水的废人，但那也是个活着的废人。每个月仆人们都要给他洗一次非常必要的澡，这中间就有很多文章可做了……特别是那些仆人被我们所买通的时候。

original: Whispers have reached my ears that the target of the plot I am backing is due to embark on a little boat trip. I have it on good authority that the child has not yet learned to swim. If the boat was to flounder... well, these things happen all the time, don't they?
translation: 传言说阴谋的目标将要坐小船去旅行。我有可靠的消息说那个小孩没学过游泳。如果船翻了……哈，这种事情一直在发生，不是么？

original: There are snakes out there who can fell a grown man instantly with a single bite. If such a viper was to make a visit to a certain someone's bedchambers at night...
translation: 这种蛇，只需咬上一口，就能立马毒死一个成年壮汉。如果这样一条毒蛇在深夜去到了某人的寝宫里……

original: I have learned that our mutual problem likes to take in the morning air on a balcony. The fall would be a long one indeed if someone was to take a tumble from there... perhaps the railing could be adjusted slightly.
translation: 听说我们的那个小麻烦早上喜欢去阳台上。如果从上面掉下来可不得了……也许可以把栏杆弄松点儿。

original: The young nuisance we are plotting against will soon be going on a hunting trip to learn about the majesty of the wilds. With hounds and other dangerous beasts running around, not to mention arrows flying in every direction, so many things could go wrong during a hunt...
translation: 我们密谋对付的小麻烦不久要去打猎，感受下野外的风情。打猎时可以发生很多意外，身边有猎狗和其他猛兽，更不用说乱飞的箭头了……

original: The target of the plot I am backing will soon travel by carriage on an isolated road. Perhaps if we gathered some mercenaries and disguised them as highwaymen... crime is on the rise, after all.
translation: 我所密谋对付的目标近期要坐马车经过一条偏僻的小路。也许我们可以雇一些佣兵假装成拦路抢劫的强盗……总之犯罪是很多的嘛。

original: The target we are plotting against will soon embark on a lengthy journey by carriage, during which so many things could go wrong. If we could buy the loyalty of the carriage driver...
translation: 我们密谋对付的目标近期要坐马车长途跋涉，很多意外都可能发生。如果我们可以收买那个马车夫……

original: During the battle, you fearlessly charged ahead on horseback directly into the enemy ranks. Members of your personal guard riding beside you tumbled off their horses as enemy arrows found their marks, but your charge plowed straight into the enemy skirmishers and your sword ran red with their blood.
translation: 战场上，你英勇无畏地策马攻进敌阵，你的许多近侍在被敌人发现后都被射下了马背，但你直冲进去与敌人散兵搏斗，利剑上面沾满了敌人的鲜血。

original: While riding ahead with your personal guard, you suddenly found yourselves isolated on the battlefield and surrounded by enemy soldiers. A violent melee ensued but you gave a good account of yourself and managed to return to the main body of your army in time to lead it to victory.
translation: 在带领的你的近侍冲上去后，你发现自己被敌人包围了。在一阵激烈的搏斗后，你收获不少，重新回到了大部队领导你的军队取得了胜利。

original: You were in the thick of it during the battle, and your tally of slain enemy soldiers has impressed even the most grizzled sergeants in your army. As you clean the blood splatter off your sword and armor, the men cheer you for the bravery you displayed in securing this victory.
translation: 你在战斗中斩获颇丰，甚至比起最英勇善战的战士来也毫不逊色。你擦拭了武器上的血渍，人们欢呼着，你的英勇保障了胜利。

original: Using your foot as leverage, you pull your sword out of the dead corpse of the last foeman to fall by your hand in the battle. All around you, the men are cheering as the routing enemy soldiers flee in wild panic. Victory has been achieved, in large part thanks to your heroic efforts!
translation: 你使劲把宝剑从战场上的最后一个敌人身上拔了出来。人们在敌人恐慌的撤退中欢呼。胜利很大一部分要归功于你！

original: Your commanding presence on the battlefield was felt during the recent victory, by friends and foes alike. You bolstered the spirits of the men when it was needed most, and you personally led the final charge that broke the back of the enemy army.
translation: 你在最近胜利中的指挥，让朋友和敌人都感到敬佩。你在士兵们最需要的时候鼓舞了他们的精神，你身先士卒领导的最后冲锋沉重地摧毁了敌军。

original: As the enemy scurries away from the battlefield like frightened rabbits, you wipe the sweat off your brow and watch in silence. It was a hard-fought melee, and you were in the thick of it, personally leading your men to victory. Not only have you won this battle, but also a great deal of respect.
translation: 你擦拭着额头的汗水平静地看着，敌人像受惊的兔子一样逃离了战场。这是一场恶战，在危急关头你领导军队取得了胜利。虽然胜利不全靠你，但这也让你获得了很大的尊敬。

original: Songs will be sung of this day.

A strange chest made of an unknown metal was recovered by your men while they looted the holding. Try as they might, they haven't been able to force the chest open and its contents remain a mystery. It has now been deposited into your care.
translation: 你的士兵的战利品中有个用未知的金属制成的箱子。他们用尽全力也没能打开，里面是什么仍然是个谜团。这引起了你的注意。

original: One day, that chest will be opened. Mark my words.
translation: 记着我的话，那箱子总有一天会打开的。

original: While looting the holding, one of your men came upon a strange looking key made of an unknown metal. As you examine it, the metal reminds you of that mysterious chest you recovered earlier. Perhaps there is a connection!
translation: 你的人从战利品中呈上了一个用未知金属制造的钥匙。在你的检查下，这材质让你想起了早先得到的没能打开的箱子。也许这个能打开！

original: Let us see if the key will fit!
translation: 让我们看看能不能打开！

original: While looting the holding, one of your men came upon a strange looking key made of an unknown metal. You have only seen such a metal once before – that mysterious chest that has been inherited and passed along in your family. It's still gathering dust somewhere in your chambers... could this be the key that opens it?
translation: 你的人从战利品中呈上了一个用未知金属制造的钥匙。你好像之前看过这样的金属，那个从你家族中继承的箱子。它在你的密室中积满了灰尘……这个就是它的钥匙吗？

original: The key fits the lock, and trembling with anticipation you slowly open the chest. It is filled with ancient gold coins, carved with the likeness of the long-dead Emperors of Rome and words written in their strange language!
translation: 这个钥匙能打开，满怀期待的你颤抖着打开了箱子。里面装满了古代金币，上面刻着某个罗马皇帝的肖像，写着奇怪的文字！

original: The key fits the lock, and trembling with anticipation you slowly open the chest. Disappointingly, it contains only a few parched scrolls that crumble into dust at your touch. Whatever wisdom they held has been forever lost to the world.
translation: 这个钥匙能打开，满怀期待的你颤抖着打开了箱子。令你失望的是，里面只有一些焦黄的卷轴，并且在你的触碰下变得粉碎。上面不管记载了多少智慧，都永远不会有人知道了。

original: The key fits the lock, and trembling with anticipation you slowly open the chest. Sadly, it is filled with nothing but worthless baubles and various trinkets. There is not a trace of gold to be found here, but the contents of the chest could probably be traded away for a few coins at least.
translation: 这个钥匙能打开，满怀期待的你颤抖着打开了箱子。可悲的是，里面除了一些小饰品外什么都没有。虽然丝毫没有金子的影子，但里面的东西也许多少能卖点钱吧。

original: The key fits the lock, and you slowly open the chest. It contains nothing but dust! As you run your hand through it, strange lights begin to manifest in the room and you close your eyes when the first ghostly apparitions appear. You hear the screams of your guards, and when you finally open your eyes again, the spectres are gone... and your guards have been reduced to ash.
translation: 这个钥匙能打开，你慢慢打开了箱子。里面除了灰尘设么也没有！当你的手穿过它时，奇怪的光出现在了屋子里，幽灵一出现你就闭上了眼睛，你听到了守卫的尖叫，等你睁开眼时幽灵已经走了……你的守卫被变成了一堆灰烬。

original: This... this chest needs to be buried...
translation: 这个箱子还是埋起来的好……

original: You stow the chest safely away for now.
translation: 你把箱子安全地保存了起来。

original: You have the chest buried and vow never to speak a word of it to another soul.
translation: 你把箱子埋了并发誓决不吐露此事。

original: I like the sound of that!
This character has earned a reputation as a fearsome Viking raider.
translation: 这个角色获得了维京海盗这一令人惧怕的称号。

original: The schism at the heart of Islam dates back to its earliest days. The majority Sunnis have long persecuted the followers of Ali, the Shias, forcing them into hiding. The partisans of Ali look to his descendants for leadership, but they are forced to keep their ancestry secret. Now though, the Shias are mobilizing their strength behind a boy whom they claim to be Ali's rightful heir and Imam. Other Islamic jurists claim that the boy is clearly a fraud, but to his followers he is the person they have been waiting for and now they flock to his banner.
translation: 伊斯兰核心的分裂要追溯到最早的时日。逊尼作为多数派长期迫害阿里的追随者，什叶派，迫使他们躲起来。阿里的坚定支持者盼望他的后裔们出面领导，但他们却被迫保守他们祖先的秘密。不过现在，什叶派聚集到了一个孩子周围，声称他是阿里的后人和伊玛目。其他伊斯兰法学家说这个孩子是个骗子，但对于追随者来说他就是他们一直在等的人，并聚集到了他的旗帜下。

original: He is but a mere boy!
Ha! The fools fight amongst themselves.
translation: 哈！这些蠢货开始自相残杀了。
